productBaseInfoV1.title: Thrustmaster Ferrari 458 Italia X-box Racing Wheel(Black, For Xbox)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Feel the adrenaline pumping through your veins as you drive through the streets in your supercharged muscle car or speed off along a carefully coordinated racetrack in your finely tuned Formula One car. Sure you might not actually be able to do all this, but with the Thrustmaster Universal Challenge 5 in 1 Racing Wheel, you can surely try to build up a virtual sweat while cornering or managing a dangerous curve in your chosen high end game. The games designed after racing tournaments go to great lengths to recreate the graphics and detailing found in the real world, so it is only fair to use the right equipment in order to feel as close to the action as virtually possible. The Thrustmaster Universal Challenge 5 in 1 Racing Wheel comes with a steering wheel and a set of pedals that correspond to braking and acceleration. The various buttons found on the wheel are configurable to suit your individual racing needs. The Wheel also has gear shift paddles like in the real Ferrari and rightly so, as the Thrustmaster Universal Challenge 5 in 1 Racing Wheel is officially licensed by Thrustmaster for manufacturing with the Ferrari logo and designs. The Thrustmaster Universal Challenge 5 in 1 Racing Wheel is compatible with the Personal Computer, Play Station 2, Play Station 3 and also the Wii. This means that you can use this racing wheel with all sorts of consoles made by major brands and has a wide range of games that are compatible with the Wheel. Gamers want to win, it is in their blood and they will thus rely on only the best equipment like the Thrustmaster Universal Challenge 5 in 1 Racing Wheel to see them to the goal. The wheel is a product of passion, innovation and high grade quality. The wheel comes with linear resistance and vibration that allows it to center itself. When you turn the wheel and let it go, it centers itself, much like a real life steering wheel with power steering incorporated into it. The associated footrest provided with the pedal assembly allows for precision control and comfortable foot placement during races. The attachment system provided with the assembly ensures that you are able to fix the device in a stable manner. The sensitivity of the wheel is adjustable as well.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Dying Light(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: When the dead begin to walk with a ravenous appetite for human flesh, your only hope for survival is to kill, or you will be killed. Developed by Techland and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, Dying Light is a survival horror, action role-playing video game that offers, both, the single-player and multiplayer modes. This game received a provisional rating of 18 from PEGI and this disc is meant for the Xbox One console. Set in a dystopian post-apocalyptic metropolis that is infested with zombie-like beings that were once human, Dying Light follows Kyle Crane, an undercover operative, who is sent to a fictional city called Harran to infiltrate the quarantine zone so as to locate a rogue agent named Kadir "Rais" Sulaiman. Kadir holds a file that could damage the reputation of Kyle’s agency. Once Kyle arrives at the quarantine zone he is confronted by a choice - complete assigned missions or help other survivors. The gameplay of Dying Light sees the player assuming the role of Kyle Crane. Travel the dark, open-world urban environment of Harran which is overrun by zombies that are more aggressive at night. There are also other creatures called the predators that only come out at night; they are far more vicious and horrendous than the typical zombies. Scavenge the urban environment for useful resources and craft weapons to keep yourself safe. You can choose from over 100 weapons, such as bats, knives, axes and sledgehammers, to battle the ruthless zombies; most of these weapons are meant for melee combat. The featured crafting system allows you to create a host of innovative weapons, like a wrench that’s wrapped in an electrified barbed wire. Freerun from building to building, grapple up walls and pounce on unsuspecting foes to stay alive. Up to four players can play together online in the co-op mode. “Be the Zombie”, a unique game mode, lets you play as a zombie in other players’ worlds. What else can be said when nightmarish creatures lurk in the shadows at dusk but good night and good luck?

productBaseInfoV1.title: C&E  TV-out Cable CNE71887(Black, For TV, 7.62 m)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Overview:The HDMI cable is the newest and best digital video connection on the market. HDMI is the only cable that can transfer uncompressed high-definition video and multi channel digital audio in resolutions higher than 1080p. HDMI cables are convenient because they will allow the transfer of digital audio and video in a single cable, permitting a less confusing mess of wires and a cleaner entertainment center. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.Main Features:• 1080p Resolution. Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.• 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.• Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:• Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.• HDMI Ethernet Channel - The HDMI 2.0 specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Connected devices that include this feature can send and receive data via 100 Mb/sec Ethernet, making them instantly ready for any IP-based application.• Audio Return Channel - The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio "upstream" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback. In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.• 3D Support - The version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.• 4K Resolution Support - The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device. Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.

Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.• 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.• Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:• Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.• HDMI Ethernet Channel - The HDMI 2.0 specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Connected devices that include this feature can send and receive data via 100 Mb/sec Ethernet, making them instantly ready for any IP-based application.• Audio Return Channel - The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio "upstream" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback. In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.• 3D Support - The version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.• 4K Resolution Support - The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device. Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.

productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Overview:The HDMI cable is the newest and best digital video connection on the market. HDMI is the only cable that can transfer uncompressed high-definition video and multi channel digital audio in resolutions higher than 1080p. HDMI cables are convenient because they will allow the transfer of digital audio and video in a single cable, permitting a less confusing mess of wires and a cleaner entertainment center. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.Main Features:• 1080p Resolution. Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.• 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.• Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:• Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.• HDMI Ethernet Channel - The HDMI 2.0 specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Connected devices that include this feature can send and receive data via 100 Mb/sec Ethernet, making them instantly ready for any IP-based application.• Audio Return Channel - The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio "upstream" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback. In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.• 3D Support - The version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.• 4K Resolution Support - The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device. Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Lost Planet 3(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: This is the third exciting installment in a series of gripping adventure games by the name of Lost Planet. The franchise is well known for heavily centered story modes with the narrative being descriptive and engaging. The development team behind Lost Planet 3 is Spark Unlimited and it has been published by Capcom. Unlike previous Capcom titles, it has not been developed internally by the company. The game is composed of both Single Player and Multiplayer elements. The events showcased in Lost Planet 3 precede those in Lost Planet 1 and 2 and thus serve as a prequel to the franchise. The game developers have ensured that playing the third version of Lost Planet will be a satisfying experience for gamers, no matter the level. It is ideally suited for hard core gamers while casual gamers can still have fun while learning to play it.  The story driven game involves you as a colonist called Jim Peyton. He is employed by the Neo Venus Construction Company. This company, also known as NEVEC carries out mining operations on the planet. E.D.N III is a planet rich in minerals and other essential commodities which are extensively mined and shipped off to Earth. This version of Lost Planet 3 is designed for the PS3. The action adventure game is story intensive and will immerse you in a beautiful ice covered environment before E.D.N III transforms into a breathtaking tropical paradise. Playing Lost Planet 3 will be a great visual experience as well as a treat for those who enjoy riveting game play.

productBaseInfoV1.title: South Park: The Stick Of Truth(for PS3)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: When the whole world is going bonkers, it is up to a gang of hysterical kids from a town called South Park to determine the fate of, well, the town, or so it may seem. A single-player turn-based role-playing video game for the PC that was developed by Obsidian Entertainment and South Park Digital Studios and published by Ubisoft, South Park: The Stick Of Truth is based on the adult animated television series South Park. The plot of this game follows the protagonist, The New Kid, who is introduced to the world of madness that is the live-action role-playing fantasy of the twisted young ones of South Park who have been thoroughly gripped by the imaginary world that they have created for themselves. Two factions of the children of South Park battle it out to obtain and keep the Stick of Truth, an object of great power that allows its wielder to control space and time. The whole game is brimming with outrageous comedy that’ll make you laugh your hats off. Featuring an open-world South Park, you get to explore the nooks and crannies of the diverse and strange town while experience 14 hours worth of humour that stems from 17 of South Park’s TV seasons. Rated 18 by PEGI, you can chose from an array of unconventional characters to play as, such as, an American football helmet-wearing combatant who stuns his enemies by kicking their crotch region or a Jew whose special ability involves the use of a scalpel to circumcise and maim his enemies. With loads of weapons and armor sets that can be used, all of which can be enhanced by applying stickers on them, this game is an amusing and epic voyage.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Lego The Hobbit : The Video Game(for PS4)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: You are invited to be a part of an adventure of epic proportions, one that will decide the fate of a diverse fantasy world that is filled with magic and wonders beyond one’s wildest imagination. An action-adventure role-playing video game that’s developed by Traveller’s Tales and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment for the Xbox 360 console, Lego The Hobbit : The Video Game is based on the first two installments of The Hobbit film series, i.e., The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey and The Hobbit: Desolation of Smaug. Both the aforementioned films are based on a highly acclaimed novel by J. R. R. Tolkien. The third installment of the film series will be re-rendered as an expansion pack which will be downloadable. Rated 7 by PEGI, the gameplay of Lego The Hobbit : The Video Game involves the player playing as one of the main characters of The Hobbit film series, i.e., Bilbo Baggins, the timid Hobbit; Gandalf the Grey, the mighty wizard; or any one from the group of dwarves from the films, which includes; Thorin, Balin, Bifur, Bofur, Fíli, Kíli, Óin, Glóin, Dwalin, Nori, Ori, Bombur and Dori. Each character has his own unique ability that will add to the gameplay of Lego The Hobbit : The Video Game; for example, Bombur’s belly can act as a trampoline in dire situations where one would be needed. The mythical locations that are covered by this game include; The Misty Mountains, Bag End, Goblin-town, Hobbiton, Mirkwood, Lake-Town, Goblin-town, Rivendell , Dol Guldur and The Lonely Mountain. As the player progresses through the game, he or she has to mine gems, uncover loot from villains, and create mighty magical items or immense LEGO structures that will help in accomplishing the objectives that one is given in order to achieve success.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Mortal Kombat X(for PS3)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Prepare yourself for the ultimate fantasy fighting experience as the latest Mortal Kombat game is out. Developed by NetherRealm Studios and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, Mortal Kombat X is a single-player/multiplayer fighting game for the PC. This game runs on a modified version of the Unreal Engine 3. There is no ESRB/PEGI rating for this game yet. Mortal Kombat X features a fresh, authentic and non-linear storyline. The plot of this game ensues from where the previous installment left off, hence, a lot of focus is on veteran warriors and the next-generation of fighters. The following are four new fighters who have been introduced to the Mortal Kombat franchise: Cassie Cage, the daughter of Sonya Blade and Johnny Cage; D’Vorah, a female who commands insects; Kotal Khan, a blood god, and Ferra/Torr, a duo comprising of a massive masked brute and a dwarf-woman. There are three different variants for each character in this game; each variant wields a distinct skill set. Similar to previous games in this series, Mortal Kombat X’s gameplay sees two players fighting each other to the death with an array of special moves, attacks and brutal Fatalities. First implemented in the previous title of this game series, the energy meter allows players to execute X-Ray moves; some adjustments have been made to this system. As in Injustice: Gods Among Us, players will now be able to interact with their environment much more - players can use objects in their surroundings and will reposition themselves when they bounce off certain areas.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The world of Azeroth is being ravaged by the Orcs. In a time like this, humans have to build a collation if they are to save the planet. The question at large is who will join the humans? Will the dwarves who are known for their cunning ability see humans as a viable partner or will humans perish fighting the sheer number of Orcs? Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos tells the story of four different factions all trying to reach objectives of their own. Discover magical and mystical creatures in a game that took the world by storm. The 2nd sequel to Warcraft: Orcs & Humans, Reign of Chaos packs in many innovative features that will quickly turn the game into a daily addiction. The game is targeted towards the fans of franchise and for anyone who likes magical and mystical creatures. The real-time strategy game is available for the PC platform. The game DVD carries a Teen rating from ESRB. Synopsis and Features The demon army of Burning Legion is intent on acquiring power in the land of Azeroth and will destroy anything and everything that lies within its path to obtain it. This has led the Orcs to become a corrupted race who will stop at nothing. Bringing different races together like the dwarves and the elves, humans have to form a coalition called the Alliance. Defeating the Orcs and ultimately the Burning Legion, the Alliance has to put an end to everything that is wrong and untrue. Developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment, Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos is one the biggest game released in the last decade. The minimum hardware required to play the game smoothly on your computer are Windows 98, an active internet connection, a Pentium II 400MHz or AMD Athlon equivalent processor, 700 MB of hard disk space, 128 MB RAM and a 8 MB RAM equipped NVidia or ATI Radeon graphics card. The single-player campaign in the game will take you through an array of missions which will unravel the cursed story of Azeroth. There are 4 different factions in the story and you can control all of them. You progress from controlling humans to the Undead then to the Orcs and in end control the Night Elves. The ever changing environment with different characters provides an energetic and exciting gaming experience. Each of these factions has some groups such as elves, dwarves, trolls, taurens, warrior druids and many more. Each faction will have a hero which is unique to the faction. You can recruit 3 heroes in one faction, depending on how well you are playing the game. The heroes in this game include pure fighters such as orc blademaster, support fighters such as human paladin and a castor who casts magic spells. Each of these heroes’ advances quickly depending upon the fight you put them in. Gain enough experience and your one hero can take out an entire horde of enemies. This makes for an action-packed gameplay experience as you can make your hero stronger than any unit in the entire game. If you are a big fan of creating your own maps and sharing it with friends, you can do it in Warcraft III as it features a fantastic world editor. With the help of this feature in the game you can unleash your creativity to its absolute maximum. Online Features Multiplayer is more fun in Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos as you can use the heroes featuring in single-player campaign. This will give your opponents a run for their money as you can beat them down easily with your level 48 orc blademaster anytime. You can even use maps created in the World Map editor to play against others. You can compete with others using Battle.net or LAN. If you feel like you want to know more about the things happening in the world of Azeroth, you can download or buy an expansion pack for the game named The Frozen Throne. The updates, demos and wallpapers for the game can be downloaded directly from the company website.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2013(for Wii)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Take control of your favourite international football players and teams by playing Pro Evolution Soccer 2013. Rated 3 by PEGI, developed and published by Konami, Pro Evolution Soccer 2013 is a single-player/multiplayer/online multiplayer sports video game for the PS2 console. This game got a rating of 8.5 out of 10 from IGN and 8 out of 10 from GameSpot. All 20 teams from Campeonato Brasileiro Série A, a Brazilian national league, have been introduced into the PES game series with Pro Evolution Soccer 2013. The UEFA Champions League has been featured in this game as well. Players are given a greater freedom when it comes to ball control. The manner in which players receive and hold the ball has been enhanced. Players have the option to manually control shots so as to get the precision that they require. The pace of dribbling has been reduced so as to make the game more realistic. The R2 control can be used to make the player apply various styles to close control. Signature skills, attributes and tricks of players have been included in Pro Evolution Soccer 2013 to make players more recognizable and lifelike; players can be distinguished on the field with greater ease this way. Pro Evolution Soccer 2013 is much more balanced now since the ProActive A.I. (artificial intelligence) has been introduced. Teams are much more organized when attacking or defending. Players are more responsive when they lose or gain possession. So, prepare yourself to have an action-packed virtual football gaming experience!

Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.

productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Sony is well known for their highly successful gaming consoles, like the PlayStation 1, 2 and 3. Each console has been a definitive leap forward in terms of gaming technology and graphics. The PlayStation 3 or the PS3 as it is more commonly known has been more successful than its predecessors thanks to the wide range of games available for it. The upcoming PS4 release is perhaps the most anticipated of all releases a gaming console has ever had. Connectivity Options You have the choice of USB 3.0 connections for controllers and accessories or you can go in for the HDMI connection that is necessary to connect the functional console to the display output, like an HD enabled Television. The PlayStation 4 is well on the way to becoming one of the most popular new releases in terms of gaming equipment and peripherals. You can easily Buy the PS4 online after its release later this year. Connecting to the internet is simple enough, with an Ethernet port allowing seamless internet connectivity. You also get a Bluetooth Connection which will help in pairing compatible accessories with it. The console also supports Wireless Connectivity for easy access. Memory Capacity The PlayStation IV comes with a hefty 500 GB Internal Hard Drive. This massive Drive is more than sufficient for storing all your online games and offline game saves. The more space available to the user, the more game saves and online copies can be stored in it. Graphics and Processing The PS4 is slated to come with a powerful and efficient Single Chip Custom Processor, mainly the Low Power x86 – 64 AMD Jaguar. You also have an 8 Core CPU. The GPU comes with a 1.84 TFlops clock speed. That is one of the fastest GPUs available for consoles thus far. The Next Generation Radeon Based Graphics Engine will help in rendering the newer games in far greater detail and clarity. You also get a GDDR5 8 GB Memory which will help in improving memory based functions like quick interface options and processing supported by RAM and a host of other features.

Lastly the fact that Hanuman never kills his adversaries only frees them (Soul) of their bad Karma is a defining moment in the story

productBaseInfoV1.title: SONY PlayStation 3 (PS3) 500 GB with In Famous, Uncharted Drake's Fortune, Heavenly Sword(Charcoal Black)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Now get kicking, punching, shooting, driving or mystery and puzzle solving in your very own virtual world or experience the best in HD home entertainment with the visually upgraded PlayStation 3. Developed by the world renowned electronics manufacture Sony, this is the third major variant of their highly coveted flagship console, which is lighter and slimmer than the previous PlayStation 3 Slim. Featuring advanced and updated software, this PlayStation 3 500 GB console is fully capable of Blu-Ray and 3D playback for both games and movies. One of the most noticeable changes is the inclusion of a 500 GB Western Digital Scorpio Blue hard drive. This hard drive runs at 5400 RPM and has an impressive 8 MB of cache memory, giving you easy file navigation with fast file transfer speeds. The inbuilt DVD and Blu-Ray player makes this gaming console also serve as a centrepiece of a home entertainment unit, thus eliminating the need for different disc players. Design and Power The design of the PlayStation 3 500 GB is testament to the parent brand Sony and their trademark styling, which is known for its aesthetics without compromising on functionality. This is perfectly demonstrated on this PS3 as it is slimmer while still managing to house a larger memory than its predecessor. The trademark flat black façade seen in all the previous models of the PlayStation 3 is continued, with the added availability of a custom PS3 skins. The front portion of the PS3 500 GB houses the touch sensitive buttons for the Power and Disc Eject functions. The front panel of the console also contains two USB 2.0 ports which allow you to charge the wireless controllers or connect an external memory device to watch movies, listen to music or browse through your digital photographs. Performance and Connectivity The PlayStation 3, right from the first ever launched model, has always been appreciated and hailed for its multiple options for external connectivity. On the PS3 500 GB, Sony has taken this connectivity features to another level with the inclusion of a built-in memory card reader. The other connectivity avenues on this console include Bluetooth, Wi-Fi and Ethernet port for internet connectivity along with an HDMI port and an AV multi output port. This HDMI port, with the help of a high speed HDMI is capable of supporting video resolutions of up to 1080p as well as 3D video content. The internet connectivity on this Sony PlayStation 3 500 GB is through Wi-Fi or an Ethernet cable, which lets you browse the internet with its very own browser and also allows you to download online material like game demos or game updates. Controllers and Joysticks The PS3 500 GB console comes with a motion-sensitive DUALSHOCK 3 wireless controller that connects to the console via Bluetooth. This means you no longer will get the wires in a knot nor will you have a set distance limit from the console due to the length of the controller cable. The layout of the controller stays the same as on the previous models with pressure sensitive buttons and the force-feedback that make sure that you feel right in the middle of your game sequence.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Just Dance 2014 (Kinect Required)(for Xbox 360)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Dancing is a fun filled activity which will help in keeping you active and fit. This might prove a passion for some and as such will be a great hit even in a virtual form. The Just Dance 2014 game is developed and Published by Ubisoft and is set to release later in 2013. The game will require the use of a Kinect Motion Sensor and as such, is well suited to the Xbox 360. It consists of a Single Player mode as well as an interactive and fun filled Multiplayer mode. The game can be used as part of a fitness program as well, which will help in developing a regular fitness regime. A total of half a dozen players would be able to play the game with individual Motion Tracking being possible. Players will also be able to take advantage of the classic Free Dance mode. This mode is a recurring dance form from previous titles of the series. There is also an On Stage mode where one player is the lead dancer with a couple of players serving as the backup dancers. It also comes with a fun and interactive Karaoke mode with the help of the microphone. The game comes with a PEGI rating of 3.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2016 (Anniversary Edition)(for PS3)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The famed PES series is back. And this time it’s bigger, better and meaner. The new Pro Evolution Soccer 2016 (20th Anniversary Edition) is a step closer to achieving Konami’s dream of establishing the series as the definitive soccer experience for gamers. This edition takes cues from its predecessor by focusing on core gameplay as well as new gameplay and presentational elements. Gameplay and Features The heart of the game is the industry-leading Fox Engine that brings the on-pitch action to life. The game features a redeveloped Master League as well as other enhancements and tweaks to perfect your footballing experience. Furthermore, PES 2016 will feature UEFA Champions League and Europa League club competitions which can be played as individual modes or as a part of the larger season overview upon qualification. Some of the new features seen in this game include: Advanced Collision System - The in-game physicality has been significantly improved and it calculates how players interact and creates unique outcomes depending on the type of impact. Perfect Defence - Performing tackles, be it standing or sliding, at the perfect time will shove the opponent out of the way and allow you to secure the ball. New Visuals - The in-game visuals see a huge upgrade from previous editions. Rain splashes as players slide to win possession or real turf textures are some of the many improvements. Genre, Game Modes, Compatibility and Rating This sports game can be played either in single-player or multi-player mode on the PS3 console. The game has a PEGI 3 rating.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Dragon Age : Inquisition(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: When all the realms of the land are in deep turmoil and chaos, a hero must rise to save the land from utter destruction. Rated 18 by PEGI, developed by BioWare and published by Electronic Arts, Dragon Age: Inquisition is a single-player action role-playing game for the PS3 console. This game incorporates both, the Frostbite 3 and the SpeedTree game engine. Dragon Age : Inquisition is the third main release in the Dragon Age franchise. Set in the fantasy world of Thedas, Dragon Age : Inquisition offers greater geographic territory than previous installments. Ensuing from the events that took place in the supplementary novels, Masked Empire and Dragon Age: Asunder, the narrative of Dragon Age : Inquisition witnesses a civil war between a mighty noble faction led by Grand Duke Gaspard and the loyalists of the ruling Empress. At the same time, the Circle of Magi have become villainous. There are four playable classes in-game, they are the following: Human, Elf, Dwarf and Qunari. The combat system has been altered to emphasize more on a player’s position, ability to prepare and form a cooperative team with one’s party members; this requires the player to think and play more intelligently. The romance facet of the game has been enhanced as well. A player’s keeps can be customized for commerce, espionage or military purposes. More influence can be gained by players in certain areas of the world by capturing forts and keeps. Furthermore, two forms of combat systems have been featured in Dragon Age : Inquisition, one being action oriented and the other being more conventional.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Bioshock: Infinite (Premium Edition)(for PS3)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Bioshock: Infinite Premium Edition includes: A 25 millimeter, resin-cast Handyman board game figurine A Murder of Crows keychain A 5 x 7-inch lithograph print An art book that offers a look at the making of the game’s unique art style. Also includes additinal Digital content: Exclusive in-game gear BioShock Infinite-themed Xbox LIVE Avatar Costumes A digital soundtrack The BioShock series took the world by storm when it first appeared in August 2007. Bioshock Infinite promises to exceed the expectations set by the first two parts and has even received early pre-release attention by winning several awards including Best of Show at the 2011 E3 Show. BioShock Infinite is not a direct sequel or prequel to the previous two BioShock games. BioShock Infinite is the third game in this exciting series that is developed by Irrational Games and published by 2K Games. The lead designer Ken Levine and his team have taken gameplay and graphics to the next level. This game falls under the survival horror first person shooter video game category that many gamers enjoy playing. This single and multiplayer player game is for the computer and having a good setup allows you to play the game in high definition which will definitely improve the gaming experience. ESRB has awarded a rating of RP-M which stands for rating pending, targeting a rating of mature or above. Synopsis and Features The City of Columbia was built and launched by the American government in the year 1900 as a beacon to symbolize American ingenuity and exceptionalism. Columbia is a floating city that stays suspended in the air with the help of giant blimps and balloons. The city was named in homage to the female personification of the United States and was designed to be a floating Worlds Fair that would travel the world. Later during the game, Columbia undergoes a transformation and reveals itself to be a well-armed battleship capable of raining down deadly attacks, leaving the people below at the city's mercy. The American government disavows the city as they lose control over it. Columbia, then disappeared off the map only to appear to impose its will on the people below. Civil war eventually breaks out in Columbia and different factions are formed. The faction in control of the city are the Founders who are led by Zachary Hale Comstock and they are opposed to any foreigners being given the same privileges as Americans. The other major faction existing during this event is the Vox Populi, who are a bunch of rag-tag resistance fighters, led by Daisy Fitzroy. Vox Populi consists of members from several factions with similar ideologies, that want to free Columbia from the rule of the ultranationalists. After years of war, the members of Vox Populi start using more violent and brutal methods to fight the powers-that-be. The game takes place in 1912 where you assume the character of Booker DeWitt, a disgraced former agent of the Pinkerton National Detective Agency. He is hired by unknown individuals who want a young woman named Elizabeth rescued from the floating city. Elizabeth has been held captive for the last 12 years as the Founders believe that she has the power to end the conflict and restore control of the city back to them. The Vox Populi would rather kill Elizabeth than let her powers be used by the founders. The game also deals with Columbia being ravaged by tears in the fabric of space-time continuum which seem to one of the powers Elizabeth has been given. BioShock Infinite combines some role-playing elements with a first-person shooter experience similar to the first two games. Find and collect weapons to use while you help rescue Elizabeth. Booker is also able to use a variety of powers and abilities with the help of vigors and nostrums that are found throughout Columbia. Nostrums help improve Booker's passive abilities like strength and damage resistance while the vigors grant powers like telekinesis, manipulation of electricity and controlling animals. Team up with Elizabeth and use her powers to enhance your own while you escape the city.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Sid Meier's Railroads!(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: In a nutshell:< b> Railroad Tycoon returns in all but name as Sid Meier reinvents the series and business sims in general with completely real-time gameplay and surprisingly impressive graphics. The lowdown:< b> This may be the latest in a long line of Railroad Tycoon games but it actually plays very differently from the slow paced turn-based games of old. Everything occurs in real-time as you race to compete one of the preset objectives from around the world and from the 19th century onwards. Starting with a single train depot in the middle of nowhere you have to build up your rail network until you control not just transport but all the industries connected to it. This becomes particularly important when youre playing online against real players as you all compete to service the biggest cities and be first to take advantage of new technology. The premise may sound dull but the game itself will make a trainspotter of anyone. Most exciting moment:< b> As complex as the game may sound what makes it popular with ordinary gamers is that its actually extremely easy to play. Despite the influence you have on cities and factories you only ever actually lay down tracks and stations and the computer handles the rest automatically. It also helps that the graphics are really good for what initially sounds like a dull strategy game. Since you ask:< b> Sid Meier the man behind Civilization pretty much invented the business simulator with the original Railroad Tycoon in 1990. Developer Frixais which Sid help to found is now owned by publisher Take-Two who also own the rights to the Railroad Tycoon name. Oddly the company decided not to reuse it for this revamp. The bottom line:< b> Sid Meier returns to the age of steam with the biggest train set ever made. Product Features< b> Real-time action lay track route the trains and the world comes to life< li>Easy to get started laying track is as easy as clicking and dragging< li>It's all about the trains! over 30 trains to use from the primitive 0-4-0 Planet to the Super powerful 4-6-6-4 Challenger< li>LocoBuilder design your own steam engine from the ground up< li>We've got the goods over 20 different goods to harvest produce and sell< li>Something for everyone build your dream train layout in train table mode< li>Multiplayer Ruthless real-time LAN and Internet play< li>

productBaseInfoV1.title: Moto GP(for PS2)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: As motor sports go there are few more thrilling than motorcycling. Formula 1 is fast but the cars look like speedy elephants when compared to the crazily unstable looking shape of a 350 or 500cc motorbike. Take one lightweight death-trap add a loony madman in a leather suit--you the player--and take off around five real-world tracks modelled right down to the last blade of grass. Super! However from the instant the starting flag drops it becomes obvious that this is no standard racer. In the early stages its a swine to control your rider weaving all over the track like a drunk with a major stability problem. Get over these initial difficulties however and what you have is a wonderful game that falls somewhere between an arcade game and simulation without ever straying too far into either camp. Multiple modes are as usual offered for your gaming pleasure including the chance to run the tracks in Arcade mode or go for a full season of racing--impressive when youve only got five tracks. The bikes are fully configurable with settings for a myriad of different components and attributes that should keep the serious bike fan happy for hours. Graphically its a total treat in-game images are good and sharp and theres no slow-down as you hammer around the circuits. Its in the replays that Moto GP really shines; notwithstanding the Gran Turismo playback feature there is nothing more beautiful than this game--at times its easy to forget the TV is displaying a computer-generated image and not straight from Sky TV. Moto GP will not be to everyones taste its initial difficulty level is off-putting but stick with it for a short while and youll be rewarded with a great racing experience and a title thats well worth the asking price Product Features< b> Official licence of the FIM World Motorcycle Championship< li>Real tracks teams and riders< li>Challenge mode--54 challenges with rewards to unlock< li>Season mode offering mid-season transfers< li>Race against the clock your previous best time and the odds< li>Fantastic replay mode that looks almost as good as watching on TV< li>Detailed bike and circuit graphics with genuine trackside scenery< li>< ul>

Their goal was to imprison the captives in a virtual prison to break down their will...but they never realized that the individuals they brought onto their ship weren't fat cat politicians: they were the most dangerous men and women on the planet. After being trapped in a Matrix-like recreation of the open-world city of Steelport, the Saints exploit errant code in the simulation. Leap tall buildings, outrun sports cars, set your enemies on fire and fling them throughout the city—all with the power of your mind! productBaseInfoV1.title: Medal Of Honor : Warfighter(for PS3)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: When war is consuming the world one bullet at a time, who will arrive to save the countless innocents who are being targeted by atrocious forces? A single-player/multiplayer first-person shooter video game for the PS3 console, Medal Of Honor : Warfighter follows two Navy SEALs of AFO Neptune, a unit of U.S. Tier 1 operators, called Preacher and Mother as they encounter diabolical criminals all across the world. This game focuses on real-world events like hostage rescues in the Philippines, Somalian pirate attacks and much more. Rated 16 by PEGI, this game uses the Frostbite 2.0 engine and was developed by Danger Close Games and published by Electronic Arts. Medal Of Honor : Warfighter offers a single-player campaign which closely follows the story of the Tier 1 Operators. The single-player features different locations such as Pakistan, Bosnia, Somalia and Philippines. The multiplayer mode allows the players to get involved in international battles and one can decide which country they would like to fight for and defend. Players can pick from 12 tier 1 units that hail from 10 different countries. One can also decide to play as a part of 6 different classes, i.e., Assaulter, Spec Ops, Demolitions, Sniper, Point Man and Heavy Gunner; each respective class has unique abilities and benefits. The user can customize his/her player’s weapons and appearance. One can also equip their player with various optics, magazines, barrels, stocks and more. Features that were available in the prequel of Medal Of Honor : Warfighter, such as, requesting for ammunition, peak and lean, and sliding, have been retained. New additions to this game include micro-destruction and Dynamic Door Breach.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Prince Of Persia : Revelations(for PSP)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Demon forces are out to get you and all you can do is fight them in a hope that they will stop someday. In Prince Of Persia: Revelations you, playing as the acrobatic genius prince, have to embark on a quest that will help you to find answers for the many questions you have. On this quest, you will uncover dangerous forces that are after your life for a very particular reason. You have to find out the reason and silence the enemy forces before they get you once and for all. Revelations follows the prince’s story after events ended in the previous game Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time. The game is targeted towards gamers who are fans of the Prince of Persia series. The action-adventure video game has many new features and game levels that make it a worthy buy. The UMD is available for the PlayStation Portable gaming console and comes with a Mature rating from ESRB. Synopsis and Features A demon called Dahaka is hunting down the Prince of Persia. Death is stalking him like an old friend and now the prince must try his best to avoid it. With his life at stake, the prince must find a way to outsmart everyone who is after him. Can he do it in time or will he succumb to the evil forces, never to rise up again? Prince Of Persia: Revelations paints a grand canvas for gamers who like explosive combat and a powerful story. Developed by Pipeworks Software and published by Ubisoft, Revelations features excellent combat mechanics that make it a stellar game. The single-player campaign in the game will allow you to use a variety of weapons. Kill enough enemies and you can even carry 2 weapons at a time to kill enemies faster. Dual-wielding of weapons is very useful when you are surrounded by a horde of enemies. The game’s primary objective is to discover hidden paths that allow you to solve a puzzle. The best way to do this is to look around a room and find out clues, allowing you to sneak out of it. You have to be careful in every level you play as there are traps. The combat in the game is intense as you can decapitate your enemies with severe blows. There are a variety of sand powers that can be unlocked within the game. One off the many available sand powers is recall and allows you to rewind time for a few seconds. This power is especially helpful if you have done a mistake or are unsuccessful from making a jump from one platform to another. The sand powers use sand that is stored in the sand tanks. You can replenish them by successfully defeating your enemies or by breaking furniture.  The visual elements that are spread across the game are beautifully created for a handheld game. The adrenaline-pumping soundtrack is a great addition as it will motivate you to finish off your enemies faster. As you move along the game you can save your progress by reaching the water fountains. There are a variety of attacks that the prince can master to take down his enemies. All of these elements add depth to the gameplay, making the game enjoyable for anyone who plays it.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Sniper Elite 3(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: If you have to make it out of a war alive then you ought to be the best. Rated 16 by PEGI, developed by Rebellion Oxford and published by 505 Games, Sniper Elite 3 is a single-player/multiplayer tactical shooter video game for the Xbox 360 console. Sniper Elite 3 serves as a prequel to the game Sniper Elite V2 and is the third title in the Sniper Elite game series. Set in North Africa during the Second World War, the plot of Sniper Elite 3 follows Karl Fairburne, an American OSS agent, ordained to perform reconnaissance and to assist the Allied forces with his sharpshooter skills. Along the course of his mission Karl finds out about a secret “wonder weapon” tank which is capable of annihilating the Allied forces. The gameplay of Sniper Elite 3 requires the player to be extremely stealthy when making his or her way through the, now much larger, open environments. The massive surroundings and the non-linear routes give greater freedom to the player when it comes to movement and approach of play. The player needs to scour the maps so as to make and discover opportunities to take out enemies. The revamped A.I. (Artificial Intelligence) system that has been incorporated in this game emphasizes more on tactics and squad roles. More than 40 new distinct customization parts for one’s rifle can be unlocked by participating in the single-player and multiplayer modes and earning sniper ranks. The three kinds of co-op multiplayer modes offered are the following: Overwatch, Story Campaign and the newly introduced Survival mission. Deathmatch, Team Distance King, Distance King and No Cross are among some of the featured competitive multiplayer modes. Another highlight is the X-Ray Kill-Cam which allows the player to see physical features with greater detail; one can even see the muscle layer and circulatory system of an opponent once the latter has been targeted. Furthermore, stealth melee combat has been enhanced and comprehensive feedback is presented to players so that they can decide how to handle short-range or long-range combat situations.

productBaseInfoV1.title: The Bureau: XCOM Declassified(for Xbox 360)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The battle of humans against an invading alien force erupts in The Bureau: XCOM Declassified, a new story and unique gameplay experience set inside one of gaming's most storied and beloved franchises. Set in 1962 at the height of the Cold War, The Bureau tells the origin story of the clandestine XCOM organization's first encounter with a mysterious and devastating enemy. Originally established as America's covert defense against the Soviet Union, The Bureau must adapt and overcome a threat unlike anything the world has faced before. As special agent William Carter, players will call the shots and pull the trigger, leading their squad of agents in the high-stakes secret war for humanitys survival. Paramount to repelling the outside threat is The Bureaus ability to cover-up the enemys existence in order to prevent worldwide panic. In the spirit of the XCOM franchise, The Bureau's calculated combat design requires players to think and act tactically. The game's third-person perspective gives the player a sense of spatial awareness and grants them the freedom to transition in and out Carter's unique Battle Focus ability seamlessly - heightening the tactical shooter action. The Bureau also fully embraces the concept of permanent consequence. As our last line of defense, every command can mean the difference between life and death for Carter, his squad and mankind. Receive the Codebreakers Bonus Mission! CodeBreakers A top secret government communications facility responsible for intercepting and decoding the enemy's transmissions has gone radio-silent. In a desperate attempt to turn the tides of the secret war, Special Agent Carter and his squad must investigate the incident, eliminate any threats, and make contact with personnel in order to bring the facility back online and make sense of the mysterious code.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Earth Defense Force - Insect Armageddon(for PS3)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Description Developed by Vicious Cycle Software, and published by D3 Publisher ,Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon is a third-person shooter and is the sequel to Earth Defense Force 2017.The player defends a fictional city called New Detroit against an alien invasion, aided by bio-engineered terrestrial insects. The Player goes by the name of 'Lightning Alpha', leader of an elite team of fighters, known as "Strike Force Lightning." Along with two squad mates, Lightning is (usually) aided by local EDF fighting forces in the area, though they are little more than cannon fodder compared to Lightning.The story is separated into 3 chapters, which are divided into separate missions. The first chapter is akin to an introduction to the game, while the second chapter has Strike Force Lightning moving across industrial New Detroit to discover the fates of several downed Landers scattered across the city, as well as their pilots. All but one are salvageable, and it becomes piloted by a Captain Sully, a character that returns in later missions. The third chapter follows the story of Lightning finding and transporting "The Cube" to a nest in central New Detroit. Before it is deployed, an Ant Queen emerges from the nest, forcing Lightning to do battle with it to secure the drop zone. Highlights: Over 300 weapons are available. These can be purchased using a new unlock system that partially replaces the in-game weapon drop system of EDF: 2017, though some weapons are only dropped by elite enemies. Four different classes are selectable from the menu, each with special functions and exclusive equipment. All armor colors can be customized. Customized Armors: Trooper Armor: Trooper armor is the standard loadout for EDF soldiers. It has access to more weapons than any other class, and upgradable abilities that allow it to be a versatile, all-around unit. The Trooper Armor is also the only armor available in Survival Mode. Jet Armor: Jet armor is a suit Lightning Alpha can acquire to take the fight to the skies. It uses energy to replenish weapons. The jet pack allows the fastest movement across the map for any class but also the weakest protection. Tactical Armor: Tactical armor fulfills a wide ranging support role, and is the only class that can deploy turrets, mines and radar dishes. Stronger equipment is unlocked as the story progresses. Battle Armor: Battle armor transforms players into a veritable walking tank. Slow moving and hard-hitting, it comes equipped a portable energy shield and can equip some of the most powerful weapons in the game. Battle armor also can release its entire pool of energy in a massive electric blast, damaging everything unfortunate enough to be close by.

productBaseInfoV1.title: The Legend Of Zelda : A Link Between Worlds(for 3DS)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: When two worlds are threatened by a sinister sorcerer, a hero must rise to the occasion and do everything he can in order to save everyone. A single-player action-adventure game for the 3DS console, The Legend Of Zelda : A Link Between Worlds is the seventeenth installment in the Legend of Zelda game series. Published by Nintendo, this game takes place six generations after the events of A Link to the Past and between the games Link’s Awakening and The Legend of Zelda. Set in the magical kingdoms of Hyrule and Lorule, the game follows a character named Link who has to subdue a villainous wizard named Puga who wishes to resurrect the Demon King Ganon and rule the worlds of Lorule and Hyrule. Having received a PEGI rating of 7, The Legend Of Zelda : A Link Between Worlds sees the player controlling Link. The top-down two-dimensional gameplay of this game is similar to that of various Zelda games. On the 3DS, the upper screen is the main screen, while the lower one shows the gear, map, and items you hold. The land of Hyrule is similar to how it was in A Link to the Past, however, all the dungeons have been changed drastically and new ones have been introduced. When exploring the many dungeons, the game’s 3D effects are showcased and Link has to solve puzzles so he can advance. Items such as arrows, to take down long-range targets; a mallet, to knock down pegs to the ground, and a Fire Rod, to create fire storms, have been included in this game just as they were in A Link to the Past. The ammunition system of the previous games has been replaced by the magic meter which powers Link’s bombs, bow, magic hammer, spin attack and many other items and special abilities. Another highlight of this game is Link’s new skill which allows Link to enter walls and become a drawing. Link can collect hearts and Rupees when on walls, and this provides the currency needed to rent or buy items. Cracks in the walls act as portals between Hyrule and Lorule when Link is a part of the respective wall. Link’s magic meter, however, depletes with time when he traverses between the worlds.

productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Team based games are always fun to play as you do not need to worry too much about losing lives. Team games have appropriate AI characters that support and defend you when you are in trouble. Fuse is one such game where the player is always supported by the AI of the teammates. The copy of Fuse seen here is for the Xbox 360 gaming system. The game has been developed by Insomniac Games and has EA or Electronic Arts as its publisher. The game has a PEGI rating of 18. This third person shooter is primarily a single player game with extensive multiplayer support. The game is sci-fi based with a setting in the future. Humans have discovered alien technology which is found to be potentially dangerous if used improperly. Known as the Fuse, this alien technology is capable of transforming simple earth elements into devastating objects. A group of high profile agents are tasked with keeping the Raven Corporation away from this technology. This is mainly because the corrupt organization seeks to create weapons for world domination. Fuse is a cooperative third person shooter, where the game mechanics are fine tuned to aid the player no matter who is chosen. The game encourages you to play as each team member as this approach will enable you to experience all aspects of the game. Each character comes with a set of specialization points that are unique. The shifting focus will enable you to experience all of them. Features: Lethal Teamwork: Coordinate and combine abilities for extraordinary results in this frenetic four-player tactical co-op.  Work together as you take down enemies, upgrade weapons, and unlock abilities faster through the Fuse-based progression system. Secret Alien Tech: The volatile alien energy source known as Fuse can transform natural earth-based materials in potent and catastrophic ways. Whoever controls it will have unlimited power at their disposal. Experimental Weapons: Overstrike 9 agents each wield upgradeable Fuse-powered weapons—combine them to trigger Fusion for greatly increased damage. Class-Based Operatives: Use the unique LEAP feature to switch between agents during combat and take full advantage of their distinct weapons and abilities. Discover all the possibilities for unique gameplay along a deep upgrade path as you play as the unstoppable Dalton Brooks, stealth master Naya Deveraux, expert sniper Jacob Kimble, and powerful healer Isabelle Sinclair.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Crysis 3 (Hunter Edition)(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The Glint of your red Nanosuit visor is muted thanks to the interwoven technology used in its construction, the enemy has not seen you due to the stealth system making you almost invisible against the heavy jungle background. Your footsteps are light and virtually silent as you stalk your prey, choosing between the Alien Ceph and the Evil CELL Corporation as you aim your bow and choose your targets carefully. Adjusting the Nanosuit for maximum strength would improve your stability and aim. The latest in the offering by Crytek, Crysis 3 is the third installment in the First-person Shooter for the PS3. The game is published by Electronic Arts and has been Co-developed by Crytek Frankfurt and Crytek UK. The game features a prominent Single player mode with a deep set storyline that has been established since the first installment of the franchise in Crysis. In this game, Prophet reprises his role as the savior of mankind as he goes on a revenge based quest to take down the Evil CELL corporation along with the alien threat. The game uses the latest CryEngine 3 for rendering graphics and game mechanics. Prophet returns to New York City in Crysis 3 after his earlier quest of hunting down other bio-towers set up by the Ceph to eradicate all human life. Returning to the city, he sees that CELL has set up Nanodomes to encase entire cities other than New York. The New York Nanodome has become a veritable urban jungle in literal terms with swamplands, rainforests and overgrown trees. The place has been named Liberty Dome for obvious reasons due to the Statue of Liberty in the vicinity. The demographics of the environment around the city has drastically changed due to the Nanodomes and the associated environmental anomalies that go along with it. The raging rivers, the swaying leaves and the cracks on every rock, these are details that simply cannot be missed in the Crysis 3 game. The game engine used for rendering the details in Crysis and Crysis 3 work on the same principle, however, they differ from each other in terms of version and degree of detailing possible. The CryEngine 3 used for Crysis 3 is far more advanced when compared to the older versions. Crysis used to be the benchmark game that determined the playing capacity of your laptop. The general consensus has always been that, if it can run Crysis then it can support any game. With Crysis 3, that benchmark has been pushed up to a whole new level. Use the all powerful Nanosuit and Battle through the seven treacherous environments within the Dome also known as the Seven Wonders to uncover the deep seeded plot by CELL to take over land and alien technology for their own selfish needs. The game also features a Multiplayer mode that people can play by connecting through a network. Hardcore gamers will love Crysis’ multiplayer mode with assorted weaponry and tactics. Fighting against the Ceph and CELL is one thing, but fighting against another opponent with the same set of powers and abilities as you, is a totally different game. Crysis 3 is yet to be rated by the ESRB. Hunter Edition Includes: The Hunter upgrade module in-game, which boosts the stealth & target acquisition capabilities of the Nanosuit. Early access to the Crysis 3 iconic tactical bow for multiplayer, and have the Electric Arrow ammunition & a special weapon skin available right from the start 3 specialized dog-tags, to let your prey know exactly who killed them Start multiplayer at Level 5, allowing you to maintain a tactical edge on everyone else that misses this limited time offer

productBaseInfoV1.title: Crysis 2(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The most iconic city in the world is in siege. A deadly virus is wiping out the entire population. Terrifying and menacing aliens are trying to take over the city. No army is strong enough to defeat them. In Crysis 2 you as super-soldier Alcatraz are sent in to locate their weakness and destroy them. The only question is can you do what no other soldier can? The sequel to the epic Crysis series is back with much more action and advanced features that will keep you glued to your computer for hours. Targeted towards hard-core gamers, Crysis 2 promises a memorable gameplay experience. The First-Person-Shooter game is available for the PC platform and has a Mature rating from ESRB. Synopsis and Features The city of New York is in Chaos. An unknown and deadly virus is spreading through the city like wildfire. To make matters worse, there is an outbreak of aliens. These aliens are ruthless, cunning and deceiving and they have only one objective – conquer the entire city. You, Alcatraz, are equipped with a super-human strength inducing Nanosuit. You have to use the suit to enhance your abilities and fight against the aliens to save the city of New York. Developed by Crytek and published by Electronic Arts, Crysis 2 immerses you into a brand new story that will keep you at the edge of your seats. The minimum system requirements to run this game on your computer are Windows 7, Vista or XP, Intel Core 2 Duo 2 Ghz or AMD Athlon x2 processor, 9 GB disk space, 2 GB RAM and a 512 MB equipped Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or ATI Radeon 3850HD graphics card. Crysis 2’s single player takes you on a spectacular, visually enhanced journey across New York. The city is torn and destroyed to a major extent. The war atmosphere is eerie, giving the game a dark feel. The game follows an objective completion model, where you have to complete a set of objectives to move forward in the story. This doesn’t mean you are restricted to a level-based gameplay. In fact, you can find various routes and methods to complete the objectives as you seem fit. The highlight of the game is the Nanosuit. The Nanosuit has different modes that allow you to jump higher, be stronger and even be invisible. You just have to give a command to the suit and it will obey it in any situation. The suit has a recharging mechanism which refills automatically when depleted. The suit even allows you to combine multiple modes, making it easy to defeat enemies. The combat has been reworked and now allows you to grab enemies by the neck and throw them at alarming distances. You can now kick cars to great distances using the suit’s powers. The game has beautiful visual environments that get a lot better if you crack up the graphics settings. Customization has always been a highpoint with Crysis games and the same continues with Crysis 2. You can modify, attach and enhance your guns with military grade equipment. You can even upgrade your Nanosuit by using the glitter like substance that is available when you kill an alien. The soundtrack of Crysis 2 is clear and aggressive, drawing and involving you into the gameplay much further.   Online Features Crysis 2 has an array of different multiplayer options. The game has 6 different modes that allow you to team up with friends and wreak havoc. The variants include Instant Action, Team Instant Action, Crash Site and a capture-the-flag variant. Online multiplayer options include Assault and Extraction. The gameplay follows the same rules as the single-player campaign where you have to defeat your friends using the Nanosuit’s abilities. Each win will earn you experience points which you can use to enhance your weapons and unlock other cool things. The DLCs for the game include Crysis 2: Retaliation and Decimation. The DLCs add new maps and extra weapons, allowing you to play the game for more hours. Updates, demos and trailers can be directly downloaded from the company’s website.

productBaseInfoV1.title: C&E  TV-out Cable High Speed HDMI Supports Ethernet 3D and Audio Return 20 Feet(Black, For TV, 6.096 m)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: "Overview:The HDMI cable is the newest and best digital video connection on the market. HDMI is the only cable that can transfer uncompressed high-definition video and multi channel digital audio in resolutions higher than 1080p. HDMI cables are convenient because they will allow the transfer of digital audio and video in a single cable, permitting a less confusing mess of wires and a cleaner entertainment center. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.Main Features:• 1080p Resolution. Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.• 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.• Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:• Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.• HDMI Ethernet Channel - The HDMI 2.0 specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Connected devices that include this feature can send and receive data via 100 Mb/sec Ethernet, making them instantly ready for any IP-based application.• Audio Return Channel - The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio ""upstream"" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback. In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.• 3D Support - The version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.• 4K Resolution Support - The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device. Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters."

productBaseInfoV1.title: Diablo III(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Summary: It’s been 20 years since the Prime Evils were defeated; but now, a new Evil is about to rise. Every path leads back to the place where it all began- Tristram. Seeking to destroy the rumoured evil, you have to rise as a new generation hero who saves Tristram. In Diablo III, you are not just playing to win; you are playing to restore faith in everyone who has lost their belief in good. The third instalment in the Diablo franchise is for hard-core gamers who like to immerse themselves in innovative and addictive gameplay. The action role-playing game DVD is available for the PC platform and has a Mature rating from ESRB. Synopsis and Features Sanctuary is at peace, but not for long. Evil has descended on Earth in a form of a falling star and is ready to wreak havoc on the land of Tristram. The heroes who saved the world are long gone. Now it’s your turn to stand up to your responsibility and try to save Tristram and Sanctuary. Published and developed by Blizzard Entertainment, Diablo III packs in many new and interesting features that were unheard in the earlier instalments. The minimum system requirements for the game to run smoothly on your computer are Windows 7 or Vista, Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2 processor, 2 GB RAM, 12 GB of free space and NVIDIA GeForce 260 or ATI Radeon HD 4870 graphics card. As any role playing game, you have to level up in Diablo III. You progress through the story by completing quests. The new additions in Diablo III are the character specific quests and random adventures. This allows you to indulge in many memorable journeys, thus giving you longer game time. Many small and big improvements have been introduced in the game, including the health orbs that now fall from slayed enemies. Diablo III has 5 main classes. These include Witch Doctor: He can summon undead monsters, The Barbarian: a brute-force fighter, The Wizard: he is a master at combining stealth and magic, The Monk: a specialist in melee based attacks and The Demon Hunter: he can combine different attacks. The game also includes followers. The followers are special as they can wield a weapon, two rings and a special item exclusive only to them. The 3 followers are Kormac the Templar, Eirena the Enchantress and Lyndon the Scoundrel. Diablo III also allows the players to create hard core characters. You will be able to create one after your charecter advances to level 10. As they are a special addition, you cannot resurrect them if they are dead. One of the eagerly awaited and most talked about addition in the game includes the Auction House. The Auction House allows you to buy items by paying real money. This assists you to advance faster through the game. You can also use in-game gold to level-up your character. Online Features You can play games with other players from around the world using the Battle.net service. This multiplayer option allows you to drop in and out of sessions easily. From the spires of Caldeum to the fallen walls of Bastion’s Keep, you will fight evil at every step. Each new game promises to be more epic than the last. The trailers, updates and demos for the game can be directly downloaded from the company’s website.

productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Gamers will control Catwoman as they play the movie utilizing her unique cat-like skills senses and cunning to defeat her enemies. Boasting incredible acrobatic skills the video game Catwoman can leap across roofs run up walls pounce on prey utilize unique "cat senses" and avoid enemy bullets with feline grace. In addition she can use her whip to swing through the air and utilize the fully interactive enviroments to trap or knock her foes unconscious. Catwoman is based upon the DC Comics character. The film and game follow the story of Patience Phillips played by Halle Berry who is killed after she uncovers a dark secret held by her employers. Brought back to life by a rare Egyptian cat she becomes Catwoman and sets out to discover the truth about herself and her murderer. productBaseInfoV1.title: Mass Effect 3(for PS3)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: If you thought the stakes were high in Mass Effect 2, you have seen nothing yet. The most beloved planet in the solar system is on the brink of destruction. The myth of 50,000 years has come alive in the form of Reapers - a devastating clan of machines determined to destroy planet Earth. The army built to save Earth cannot match up to the Reapers. In Mass Effect 3, Commander Shepard has to seek help from previous alliances and team up with them to annihilate the threat called the Reapers.  Mass Effect 3 is a direct sequel to Mass Effect 2. The game is for hard-core gamers who like playing well designed third-person shooters. The action RPG gaming DVD is available for the PS3 platform and has a Mature rating from ESRB. Synopsis and Features The threat to the Human race has grown beyond anyone’s wildest imaginations. A forgotten evil has come to haunt planet Earth in the most devastating manner possible. An evil called the Reapers. You as Commander Shepard must now convince different Races across the Universe to come together and take down this evil, once and for all. Every choice you make decides the fate of planet Earth in Mass Effect 3. Will you attain the necessary alliances to save Earth or will you be too late? Developed by BioWare and published by Electronic Arts, Mass Effect 3 is packed with plenty of new features to provide you with a satisfactory gaming experience. The core of Mass Effect’s single player campaign focuses on helping out individuals, militaries, governments and entire Races to take out the Reapers. The campaign has 3 gaming modes. These include Action Mode, Story Mode, and RPG Mode. Each mode is difficult and offers various changes from the previous one.  The story moves forward as you complete objectives. The improvements in the game include an improved cover system, instant melee kills and traditional grenades. The AI has been tweaked, allowing you plan advanced methods to take down the enemy. There are many new weapons at your disposal. These weapons can be modified and customised according to your wish. There are 25 weapon mods in total. From scopes, barrels to even ammo types, every aspect of a weapon can be customized. The game offers special abilities such as War Assets and Military Readiness. While Military Readiness is helpful in multiplayer, War Assets are helpful during the campaign as they help in restricting the Reapers advance. War Assets can be collected throughout the game and are very helpful during difficult battles. Following the classic RPG format, the game allows you to level-up as you advance. The level-ups available are useful throughout the game as they help in making you stronger. There are also side-missions in the game that you can indulge in if you want to spend some time outside the main quest. Mass Effect 3 offers high replay value as your choices determine a different ending, every time you play the game from the start. Online Features Mass Effect 3 allows up to 3 more players to join you in the quest for survival. The multiplayer co-op allows you to team up with friends and take down the Reapers. This allows for a much more fun gameplay experience as you can count on your friends to help you out during difficult situations. The multiplayer mode is known as Galaxy at War and allows you to create brand new characters and embark on new quests. You can choose any one Race from the multiple ones on offer. Each Race has special powers such as Krogan Charge and more that give you a unique edge over your competitors. You can earn game credits to improve your character as well as your weapons. One of the many interesting additions to the multiplayer is the wielding of 2 weapons by a character. This allows you to mix and match weapons and have fun in the best way that every gamer is known for – by creating havoc. The DLCs for the game include From Ashes and Resurgence Pack. The DLCs add extra multiplayer maps, new weapons, new character classes and Races to the multiplayer, giving you extra game time. You can download the DLCs, trailers, and updates from the PSN Network.
