productBaseInfoV1.title: Battlefield 3 (Limited Edition)(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The world is in chaos. From Iran to New York, numerous fights and battles are intensifying by the second and you are in charge of settings things right in the latest instalment of the Battlefield series- Battlefield 3. The game is a direct sequel to Battlefield 2, and the 11th instalment in the Battlefield series. This version of Battlefield 3 is a limited edition and includes special features that are not available in the standard one. The bonus content includes Back to Karkand expansion pack featuring 4 maps reworked in the new Frostbite 2 engine. The maps include Strike at Karkand, Gulf of Oman, Sharqi Peninsula and Wake Island. The game is targeted towards hard-core gamers who seek excitement and thrill of gun-fights in a real battlefield. The First-Person-Shooter game is available for the PS3 platform. The ESRB rating for the game is Mature. Synopsis and Features Set in locations across the world like Paris, Tehran, New York, Kuwait, Oman and the Persian Gulf, Battlefield 3 promises a grand canvas for legendary battles. You take on the role of Sergeant Blackburn or Dimitri Mayakovsky and fight missions based on different locations and try to stop a war that is brewing on a global scale. Developed by EA Digital Illusions CE and published by Electronic Arts, Battlefield 3 includes massive improvements from the previous games in the series. The single player campaign of the game speaks about how modern conflicts are resulting in destruction of world peace. The campaign has some exhilarating and adrenaline-pumping missions that will keep you at the edge of your seats. One of the missions in the game is the gunner mission. This mission allows you to take the position of a gunner in a fighter plane and fight enemies in the sky. The feeling you get while playing this mission is epic as every second counts for your survival. You will be shooting planes out of the sky, escaping gunfire or deploying flares in an effort to save yourself, your co-pilot and your plane. The game features a co-op mode that offers six missions. The co-op mode is interesting as you can indulge in numerous missions like Hit-and-run and more. Battlefield 3 differs from other games because of the variety it offers. There are 6 different classes of vehicles that include jets, tanks, jeeps, armored vehicles and even helicopters. The weapons in the game range from assault rifles, sniper rifles, shotguns, personal defence weapons, machine guns, carbines, pistols to rocket launchers. If you are an expert sniper and have camped on top of building thinking I am safe here, think again. Battlefield 3 has completely destructive environments where bullets can even penetrate through walls. Entire buildings can be rigged to crumble like a deck of cards. No one is safe. It’s only your skill and sheer determination that can make a difference and help you to a win. Online Features Battlefield games are known for their huge multiplayer environments, and the same is delivered with Battlefield 3. You can be in any team you want. The teams include Assault: for frontline combat medic, Engineer: for RPG and repairs, Support: for heavy suppressive fire and Recon: for gathering Intel and sniping. You can earn points by eliminating your enemies and rising in the point system. There are different unlockables like weapons and gadgets that assist you as you graduate the ranks. There are a variety of different game modes in the multiplayer like Conquest, Rush, Squad Deathmatch, Squad Rush and Team Deathmatch. There are 9 maps based on a variety of urban, industrial, and military locations. You can team up with friends through simple 4V4 matches or up to 24 players can login at the same time to create havoc in the BF3’s multiplayer universe. You can keep track of stats from every player across the world through a free application called Battlelog. Battlelog is an auto-update feature that keeps track of your every progression in the game. You can compare your stats and know which player has the highest playtime or the highest kills and more. From Caspian Border to the corridors of Grand Bazaar, Battlefield 3 promises an intense, grand and thoroughly satisfying multiplayer experience. You can download updates and DLC’s from the PSN network to have a wholesome gaming experience.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Samurai Shodown Anthology(for PS2)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The Samurai Shodown Anthology is a compilation of games from the groundbreaking SNK weapon-based fighting Samurai Shodown series. Celebrate the history of the franchise through the years by battling as one of the greatest Samurai of all time through six separate adventures in this incredible collection. The collection includes six games from the series including Samurai Shodown I II III IV V and the never before released in North America Samurai Shodown VI. Games of the Anthology< b> Released in 1993 Samurai Shodown remade the fighting genre by introducing weapons-based combat. With it victory was made possible with a single stroke and the popularity of the genre soared. Released in 1994 Samurai Shodown II featured special moves like weapon-breaking and an increased total of 15 playable characters as the cocky Haohmaru gladly pursues forces that seeks to destroy him. Released in 1995 Samurai Shodown III featured a fighting system overhaul that made it possible for players to choose from two sword types as well as three levels of ability when entering into a duel. Released in 1996 Samurai Shodown IV introduced multiple combo elements such as slashes sneak attacks and suicides to the fighting system as well as time limits making for more possibilities and ratcheted action. Released in 2003 Samurai Shodown V increased the number of playable characters to 24 including four that are entirely new and introduced new features like "Sword Gauge" and "Concentration One. Released in 2005 Samurai Shodown VI features 2D and 3D backgrounds a large cast of playable characters from the entire series and the "spirit select" system which allows access to fighting styles from the entire series. Key Game Features:< b> Features six incredible Samurai Shodown games (releases 1-6) in one.< li>Samurai Shodown 6 available for the first time in North America in this compilation.< li>Extensive gallery of unlockable bonus materials; concept art soundtracks and more.< li>Arcade perfect port of each title.< li>Pick-up-and-play nonstop action.< li>Single player and 1-2 local multiplayer support.< li>< ul>

productBaseInfoV1.title: C&E  TV-out Cable High Speed HDMI Cable Supports Ethernet, 3D and Audio Return 20 Feet 5 Pack(Black, For TV, 6.096 m)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Overview:The HDMI cable is the newest and best digital video connection on the market. HDMI is the only cable that can transfer uncompressed high-definition video and multi channel digital audio in resolutions higher than 1080p. HDMI cables are convenient because they will allow the transfer of digital audio and video in a single cable, permitting a less confusing mess of wires and a cleaner entertainment center. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.Main Features:• 1080p Resolution. Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.• 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.• Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:• Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.• HDMI Ethernet Channel - The HDMI 2.0 specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Connected devices that include this feature can send and receive data via 100 Mb/sec Ethernet, making them instantly ready for any IP-based application.• Audio Return Channel - The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio "upstream" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback. In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.• 3D Support - The version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.• 4K Resolution Support - The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device. Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Sonic & All Star Racing Transformed(for PS3)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: If you like racing around the track with crazy cars and other vehicles that can convert to water or air faring versions, and if that passion is coupled with the urge to blow your opponents off the track to own it, then you will certainly take a shine to Sonic & All Star Racing Transformed. The racing video game is a sequel to the very popular 2010 game called Sonic and Sega All Stars Racing. The game is brought to you by Sega and is available for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. The game has a PEGI rating of 7. The racing game is mainly more focused on the fun factor of having familiar characters race against each other on insanely stylized tracks with weapons for offence and defense. The mascot based racing game involves vehicles that resemble kart racers. The characters used in the game are from various other Sega titles that is sure to make things more enjoyable for gamers on the whole. The Sonic & All Star Racing Transformed features new game mechanics like vehicle transformation to suit the terrain. This means that, during the course of the race, if you travel of the road and wish to go over water, the car will transform into a water faring vehicle and the same is true for flying as well. The car transforms into a plane for flight and the race continues in that manner. The Sonic & All Star Racing Transformed is a Single and Multiplayer game with Split Screen capabilities to accommodate two players or more offline. Players can also connect online to play against different people over the internet as well. The PS3 version of the Sonic & All Star Racing Transformed is a well designed game keeping in mind fun and excitement when it comes to the true casual gaming experience. The game features an internal combat system where, within each race itself, players can choose to fire weapons at their opponents in an attempt to disrupt their race progress, or better yet, knock them out of the race. The game also features special modes where players can unlock power ups and skills that can be used to give them an edge over their opponents and win them the race. The vehicles can automatically transform into other forms by driving or flying through what are known as transformation gates, these gates unlock the new modes of the vehicles and are very important in progressing along the levels of the race. For example, if a bridge over a river gets knocked out, then the transformation gates come in handy when you need to convert your car into a jet boat that can easily traverse over the water body and continue the race. Simply charging along a new surface is not enough, for the game mechanics are tweaked such that the physics change for every terrain. The player has to take many things into account before maneuvering the craft in air or water, taking time to consider the physics involved in each medium. The water for example is turbulent and calm depending on the stretch you traverse over, and the level of turbulence allows you to to launch into the air and perform stunts, if the conditions prove right. The game also features something known as the All-Star meter that, when filled up enables you to perform special abilities similar to the previous title. One major change that Sonic & All Star Racing Transformed carries that is not available in the previous title is that players can use the All-Star abilities even in multiplayer mode. The single player adventure mode featured in the game allows you to unlock characters and vehicle upgrades. The multiplayer mode allows you to connect with other players across the globe thanks to the PS Network and helps in making the Sega game, a wholesome experience.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Dark Souls (Game Of The Year Editon) (Prepare to Die Edition)(for Xbox 360)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: What will you do if you are pushed into a world that is infested with terrifying creatures? Would you fight them even if you have no hope of surviving the next battle or will you make yourself so strong that nobody can ever defeat you? Dark Souls is dark world that hides the most hideous monsters that you can ever imagine and they all have just one objective - to annihilate you. Do you have the willpower to escape from this cruel world? The spiritual successor to Demon's Souls, Dark Souls tells a fascinating story about survival. This edition of the game is a Prepare to Die Edition and includes new bosses such as Artorias of Abyss and Chimera of Tomb, new areas, weapons, armor and a brand new chapter. The game is targeted towards hard-core and casual gamers who like playing horror games. The open world action role-playing video game DVD is available for the Play Station 3 gaming console and comes with a Mature rating from ESRB. Synopsis and Features In Dark Souls you are introduced to the world named Lordran - a land filled with monsters, undead warriors and many other horrifying creatures. You are hunting down the person named Artorias of Abyss as he is responsible for all the chaos caused in Lordran. Artorias is very powerful and his only objective is to spread darkness as much as he can. With horrendous creatures after your life, can you make everything right in time? Discover the answers by playing Dark Souls. Developed by From Software and published by Namco Bandai Games, Dark Souls tells a dark story that will keep you up all night when you are playing the game. The single-player campaign in the game will take you across the land of Lordran as you try to explore what went wrong in the game’s universe. You have to be extremely careful of the environment around you as death lurks around every corner. The relentless onslaught from enemies keeps the gameplay engaging. There are various types of enemies in the game such as fire demons, lizardmen, evil butchers, alligators shaped like cats, skeletal swordsmen and many others. All these enemies come at you with such strength that you will be dead before you can even bat an eyelid. Only by replaying the levels and with careful planning can you kill them and move towards the next level. You start by first selecting a character then selecting a class to advance through the game. The entire game is like a huge realm with different parts that are spread out throughout the game and only open up after you complete certain objectives. Killing bosses is of utmost importance in the game as you can collect an element called Humanity. This allows you to heal better and plan better as you can take more rest. Bonfires act as checkpoints in the game. These are rarely found and should be searched with expert precision if you are to find one. The visuals are designed to induce fear and they do an excellent job at it. Online Features You can replenish your health by drinking potions available in health flasks and upgrade your inventory by spending souls you collected from downed enemies. The multiplayer experience of Dark Souls is very different from other games. The game is built with difficult challenges that need help from strangers or friends that are playing the game. While playing the game online you can see other players as shadows moving along with you. Fallen comrades are represented as blood spatters on the ground and the final moments in which they were vanquished will play on screen when you touch the blood stain. This is an excellent feature as you can learn the weak points of enemies and beat them to advance further in the game. There are many covenants spread out in the game that allow you to join them to take out other players playing the game online. However, the primary focus lies in helping people rather than killing them. You can play co-op matches with others as Dark Souls features a PvP Online Matchmaking System. The updates, demos, DLCs for the game can be downloaded directly from the Play Station Network.

productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Dishonored is an adventure game with elements of action as well. it was developed by Arkane Studios and published by Bethesda Softworks. The story begins when the Empress has been murdered and her daughter gets kidnapped. Corvo is framed for the crimes and imprisoned for it. He is to be executed in six months so that no trace of betrayal remains. Faced with such situations, Corvo takes it upon himself to break free and exact revenge on the conspirators for what they did to him and the Empire.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Borderlands : The Pre - Sequel(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: From developers 2K Australia and Gearbox Software and publishers 2K Games comes a stellar game that will give you a comprehensive gaming experience - Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel!. Rated 18 by PEGI, Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel! is a single-player/multiplayer/co-op first-person shooter/action role-playing game for the PC which is the third installment in the Borderlands game series; this game serves as a prequel to Borderlands 2. The storyline of this high-octane game follows Handsome Jack as he tries to escape the Hyperion moonbase and seize it for himself. The central characters, i.e., Wilhelm "the Enforcer", Athena "the Gladiator", Claptrap "the Fragtrap" and Nisha "the Lawbringer", start the game off as Handsome Jack’s henchmen. Though, Jack is initially a good-natured individual, the plot witnesses his dark transformation into a brutal villain who enjoys ripping people’s eyeballs out of their sockets with a spoon. This game tries to explore the idea of how villains might not be as horrible as they seem, that sometimes they do the bad things that they do for good reasons. The innovative gameplay of Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel! fuses first-person shooter elements with mechanics that are typical of role-playing video games, such as, character building, quests and randomly generated items/loot. Another fine touch to the gameplay is the implementation of a collaborative multiplayer campaign. As in previous Borderlands titles, Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel! is focuses on four playable characters; these characters were showcased as thugs (NPCs) who worked for Handsome Jack, the main villain of Borderlands 2, in the previous title. The gameplay of this game will be similar to that of Borderlands 2, however, the mechanics have been tweaked to make it much more compelling. Two new kinds of weapons have been added to Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel!, they are - items that have a cryogenic elemental effect which freeze and slow enemies down, and, laser guns.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Football Manager 09(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: If you’re an aspiring football manager then this game is the best way to test out your abilities as one. Rated 3 by PEGI, developed by Sports Interactive and published by Sega, Football Manager 2009 is a single-player/multiplayer football manager simulation game for the PC. The primary new feature in this game, in contrast to its predecessors, is the 3D match engine. You can watch the game in fullscreen and a widescreen option is present as well. the player can decide if he or she wants to fast-forward or rewind a match. The user can filter the information displayed on-screen to only get the data that seems relevant to him or her. The player can decide to play either as a male or female manager. Interactions between the assistant manager and the manager have been improved. The assistant manager gives in-match and pre-match feedback on how the team is doing in-game while also providing clues on how the team can fare better. Mid-match tactics and talks with the team have been enhanced too. Transfer rumours is another highlight of this game. Players can be trained with much ease and be assigned new positions and moves that are not naturally theirs. Player ratings now have decimal points. In the newly implemented press conferences, the user has the opportunity to build his or her rapport with journalists. Furthermore, transfer and finance systems have been revamped. More than 3,50,000 players and 5,000 playable clubs from more than 50 countries have been featured in Football Manager 2009. Apart from Germany and Japan, all other popular national teams are available and playable.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Vanquish(for Xbox 360)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The story of VANQUISH is set in the near future. Russia and the United States are vying for ownership of the world’s fast-depleting energy resources and the US has constructed a space station in order to harness energy from the sun. Russian forces capture this space station and divert its harvested solar energy into a blast wave that destroys San Francisco, aiming to force the US into a total and unconditional surrender. In response, the US tasks its armed forces with recapturing the space station before the Russians can annihilate their next target - New York. Directed by Shinji Mikami, the creator of the Resident Evil series, VANQUISH is a sci-fi shooter game that sees players take the role of Sam, a government agent kitted out with a futuristic battlesuit. A versatile war fighter with a huge arsenal of weaponry at his disposal, Sam also has an array of martial arts skills that he can use to take down his robot enemies. Fast, fluid and frenetic - this is gaming at its most explosive and exciting, as you storm into battle. Experience a game character like no other - Sam is the ultimate weapon, donning a futuristic battle suit of destructive firepower and superhuman speed and agility. productBaseInfoV1.title: Rocksmith Game With Cable(for Xbox 360)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Rocksmith revolutionizes how you improve your guitar skills or learn to play. Rocksmith is the first and only game that lets you plug ANY real guitar into your Xbox 360 or PlayStation3 system and practice your guitar skills while you play. Tested and proven to teach you to play better. 95% of Rocksmith players report an improvement in their guitar skills just by playing the game. It really works. When we say any guitar we mean any guitar. Whether it's the guitar sitting in your attic, your cherished faithful steed, or the guitar you have yet to buy, Rocksmith lets you plug it into your Xbox 360 or PlayStation 3 system and begin your road to guitar mastery instantly. Difficulty settings that adapt to your ability. Addictive gameplay adapts to your personal skill level so you go from playing single notes to complex chords at a pace that's fun and challenging without being overwhelming. Before you know it you'll be playing 1% of the real guitar parts from the songs in the game. Lots of music. Lots of styles. One of the most satisfying moments for any guitar player is learning to play your favorite song. Rocksmith's huge library of songs from different music genres allows players to achieve guitar mastery while experiencing that moment first hand. Play songs instead of just learning them. You want to play new songs but don't want to labor through tablature or cringe through poorly-produced videos. No problem. Rocksmith not only presents you with new songs but also challenges you to improve your skills by stepping away from the notes on-screen and play by memory. Masses of effects pedals, amps, and cabs.Turn your console into an amplifier and play with loads of in-game effects pedals, amplifiers, and cabinets. String pedals together with nearly infinite combinations and tweak your sound until you're satisfied. Whether it's a crunchy distortion, a vintage tremolo, or a psychedelic reverb, we have the gamut covered to make sure you can achieve the sound you're looking for. Develop real skills with mini-games. Rocksmith comes with a wide variety of mini-games that will challenge you to hone in on specific skills. Whether its scales, or finger dexterity you want to improve on, our mini-games will have you covered, and addicted. Get plugged in. Rocksmith includes a unique quarter-inch to USB cable that is the first of its kind, and will allow users to plug any real guitar with a quarter-inch jack directly into their Xbox 360 or PlayStation 3. Developed exclusively for Rocksmith, this guitar cable is 11.25' cable turns the guitar's signal from analog to digital, allowing it to be recognized and played through video game consoles for the first time.

productBaseInfoV1.title: iConnect World Super FLAT HDMI Male to Male Cable TV Lead 1.4V High Speed Ethernet 3D Full HD 1080p 4.5 Foot 1.5 m HDMI Cable(Compatible with HDTV, Purple)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: "• Premium Quality HDMI-HDMI gold plated Connectors cable suitable for use in HDTV, Plasma, LCD, PS3, Home Theater, Cable box, Projectors and business class projector based applications and more HDMI Ethernet Channel The HDMI 1.4a specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Miracast/DLNA/IOS system. It can stream and display the digital media content of your favorite Android/IOS/Windows device (e.g. Smartphone's, tablets, notebooks) to any HDMI compatible HDTV(1080P) via WIFI.• Audio Return Channel The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio ""upstream"" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback.• In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.• 3D The 1.4a version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.• The specification standardizes the input/output portion of the home 3D system, facilitating 3D resolutions up to dual-stream 1080p. 4K Resolution Support The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device.• Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters. Expanded Support For Color Spaces• 1 Year Warranty with iconnect world"

productBaseInfoV1.title: Payday 2(for Xbox 360)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Don some masks and go on a crime spree with Payday 2. The game is a sequel to the highly successful Payday with the original crew comprising of Dallas, Hoxton, Wolf and Chains. The object of the game is to go on a crime spree based on contracts. The game follows a 4-player co-op mode where you can play as one of the characters in the team. The game has been developed by 505 Games and consists of a gripping Single Player campaign as well as an engaging Multiplayer mode. The FPS game is designed for the PS3 and has a PEGI rating of 18. The game also comes with a new Crimenet network which is the bad guy equivalent of the police database. Here you will find all the contracts that need to be fulfilled in order to get paid. The team should carry out various kinds of criminal activities like Kidnapping, Emptying Bank Vaults, Cyber Crimes and many more. You can cooperate with a maximum of 4 friends to play the game. A unique feature of the game is that it consists of Dynamic scenarios where no two scenes will play out the same way. The game is a great title to own and add to your collection. Key Features: Rob Banks with Friends – Players must choose their crew carefully, because when the job goes down they will need the right mix of skills on their side. CRIMENET – The dynamic contract database lets gamers pick and choose from available jobs by connecting with local contacts such as Vlad the Ukrainian, shady politician “The Elephant”, and South American drug trafficker Hector, all with their own agenda and best interests in mind. PAYDAY gun play and mechanics on a new level – firing weapons and zip tying civilians never felt so good. Dynamic Scenarios – No heist ever plays out the same way twice. Every single scenario has random geometry or even rare events. Choose Your Skills – As players progress they can invest in any of four special Skill Trees: the Mastermind, the Enforcer, the Ghost and the Technician. Each features a deep customization tree of associated skills and equipment to master, and they can be mixed and matched to create the ultimate heister. More Masks than Ever – PAYDAY 2 features a completely new mask system, giving players the ability to craft their own unique mask together with a pattern and a color combination. Weapons and Modifications – A brand new arsenal for the serious heister, covering everything from sniper and assault rifles to compact PDWs and SMGs. Once you’ve settled for a favorite, you can modify it with optics, suppressors, fore grips, reticles, barrels, frames, stocks, all of which will affect the performance of your weapon. There are also purely aesthetic enhancements – why not go for the drug lord look with polished walnut grips for your nine? Play It Your Way – Each job allows for multiple approaches, such as slow and stealthy ambushes, to running in guns blazing. Hit the target any way you want, and watch as the heist unfolds accordingly.

productBaseInfoV1.title: C&E  TV-out Cable High Speed HDMI Cable Ethernet 3 Feet Supports 3D and Audio Return 5 Pack(Black, For Xbox, 0.9144 m)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Overview:The HDMI cable is the newest and best digital video connection on the market. HDMI is the only cable that can transfer uncompressed high-definition video and multi channel digital audio in resolutions higher than 1080p. HDMI cables are convenient because they will allow the transfer of digital audio and video in a single cable, permitting a less confusing mess of wires and a cleaner entertainment center. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.Main Features:• 1080p Resolution. Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.• 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.• Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:• Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.• HDMI Ethernet Channel - The HDMI 2.0 specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Connected devices that include this feature can send and receive data via 100 Mb/sec Ethernet, making them instantly ready for any IP-based application.• Audio Return Channel - The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio "upstream" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback. In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.• 3D Support - The version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.• 4K Resolution Support - The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device. Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.

productBaseInfoV1.title: FIFA 17 PC(Code in the Box - for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: As with all updates to EA games, expect revolutionary FIFA 17 gameplay thanks to the introduction of the Frostbite engine. This technological upgrade enables a whole host of amazing FIFA 17 features, such as a truly immersive FIFA 17 story mode, heightened realism thanks to the upgraded FIFA 17 graphics and much, much more.Some major FIFA 17 changes are as follows:SET PIECE REWRITE Enjoy total control over FIFA 17 gameplay with the advent of huge set-piece changes:more creativity and variety in delivery,the freedom to position players and dictate approach to dead-ball situations,improved AI intelligence in making runs off the ball, opening up scoring chances,increased control over run-ups and angles when taking free kicks;an all-new targeting system on corners and free kicks.All this means your FIFA 17 game experience is just like you’re standing over the ball in the stadium, ready for that game-defining FIFA moment.ACTIVE INTELLIGENCE SYSTEMIn FIFA 17, the new Active Intelligence System allows for a much more accurate simulation of the field of play. Players:are smarter and more active off the ball, allowing your playmaker to make that defence-splitting pass;use an enhanced awareness of space to read the game far better than in previous FIFA football games;analyze the players around them, using instinct to identify attacking opportunities.In FIFA 17, it truly feels like you are playing the beautiful game!PHYSICAL PLAY OVERHAULFIFA 17 truly brings the physicality of football as a contact sport to life. Unlike previous FIFA football games, FIFA 17 completely overhauls physical play:experience the heightened realism of player physics with advanced pushback technology;with a single button press, trigger physical play in any situation – you decide when to engage in a battle for the ball or space, or how you want to shield the ball;players now understand where the biggest defensive threat comes from and can shield appropriately to receive the ball.FIFA 17 gameplay never felt so real!NEW ATTACKING TECHNIQUESAs with all football games, scoring more than your opponent is the main aim. FIFA 17 takes attacking to a whole new level with more ways to create and finish chances:keep shots low and hard or deceive the ‘keeper with a perfectly placed volley – the new driven shot mechanics allow for better finesse shots;make the target more formidable with the ability to head downwards;deliver curling outside-of-the-boot passes or perfectly-weighted through-balls to unlock defences;start the attack from the back with more aggressive driven goal kicks.The many FIFA 17 changes mean the playstyles of your favourite teams are truly reflected on the big screen!THE JOURNEY – AN ALL NEW FIFA 17 STORY MODEYou are Alex Hunter. Are you the next global superstar?For the first time ever in a FIFA football game, add more to your game with the advent of an all-new type of FIFA career mode.As the Premier League’s newest prodigy, your aim is to make your mark on and off the pitch. Using the power of the FIFA 17 Frostbite engine, you will play at the biggest clubs in the world’s biggest league, for the biggest and most successful managers, and alongside the greatest players on the planet.This all-new FIFA 17 career mode lets you live the emotional highs and lows of professional football, while immersing you in a genuine football game world. Expectations are high as you rub shoulders with superstars of the game, navigate your way through the academy and into the bright lights of the stadium on matchday.Dive into this new FIFA 17 story mode and rise to the very top!FIFA 17 ULTIMATE TEAM (FUT 17)In FIFA 17, Ultimate Team just got even more ultimate thanks to these new FIFA 17 features:FUT 17 CHAMPIONS – this is the brand new way to compete in FIFA 17. Play through the week to qualify for the Weekend League and compete for fantastic in-game rewards. Consistently skillful play will result in climbing the monthly leaderboards for some of the biggest in-game FIFA 17 rewards.SQUAD BUILDING CHALLENGES – you can also earn in-game FIFA 17 rewards by completing new squad building challenges. Test your skills in creating the perfect FUT 17 team in Basic, Advanced or League-specific tasks, with new challenges being added regularly throughout the season.FUT 17 KITS – deck out your Ultimate Team squad with brand-new, exclusive kits from well-known designers and celebrities. Check out the FIFA 17 preorder offers for more on how to get custom FUT 17 kits and look the part on the pitch!OFFLINE PLAY-A-FRIEND - for the first time ever in a FIFA game you can download your FIFA Ultimate Team squads to use offline FUT 17 matches. Bragging rights are at stake!

productBaseInfoV1.title: Tekken Tag Tournament 2 (We Are Tekken Edition)(for PS3)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Nobody has ever come close to perfecting hand-to-hand combat games as the Tekken franchise. Every year with each new release, Tekken offers something new that leaves gamers mesmerized every time they play the game. With Tekken Tag Tournament 2, the developers have focused on tag team championships. Fine-tuning the combat mechanics to suit tag team matches, Tekken Tag Tournament 2 introduces new gameplay elements that will keep you addicted to the game for hours. The 8th instalment in the Tekken series and the sequel to Tekken Tag Tournament, Tekken Tag Tournament 2 offers many new characters and fight routines. This edition of the game is a We are Tekken edition and includes the following content: the original soundtrack of the game, an art book with more than 200 pages of Tekken art, behind-the-scenes videos and an additional music CD with remixes of the original soundtrack. The game is targeted towards hard-core and casual gamers who are fans of the Tekken franchise. The fighting game can provide with you hours of multiplayer fun if you invite friends over for a gaming session. Tekken Tag Tournament 2 game DVD is available for the Xbox-360 gaming console and carries a Teen rating from ESRB. Synopsis and Features Tekken Tag Tournament 2 reinvents the fighting genre with the introduction of a simple yet sturdy tutorial system called Fight Lab. Players who are new to the gaming franchise can take maximum benefit of this tutorial system as it introduces various training exercises. In Fight Lab you, playing as Combot, are a creation of Violet Industries. You are allowed to learn any Tekken character’s combat moves and techniques. As you learn more moves, you can execute difficult fight manoeuvres that will help you to win a match. Developed and published by Namco Bandai Games, Tekken Tag Tournament 2 adds many new fighters to the game. The single-player mode starts with you picking 2 players to fight with. You can switch between players at any time. This gives you the freedom to execute fight manoeuvres that are specific to a character. One of the features that set the game apart from its competitors is the close-quarter combat system. This requires you to be ready at every moment as even a split-second delay can get you to lose the match. The various fight moves include air juggles, combo punch system, blocking and throw breaks. Tag Assault system captures the spotlight as you can kick your opponent in the air and bring in your teammate into the ring by tagging him. This allows you to team together both your players’ moves and execute a powerful attack to reduce your opponent’s health. You can yield maximum bonus for your moves by attacking your opponent in a precise manner. You can do this by using the 3 attack types: launchers, bounds and tags. Launchers allow you to kick your enemy into the air, but you will be dead meat if he blocks you. On the other hand, executing a launch accurately will allow you to attack him with air-strikes, reducing your enemy’s health to a significant aspect. You can follow up a launch with a bound: this move allows you to pull your opponent of mid-air and then throw him to the ground, permitting you to string together a combo of attacks. You can also call in a partner when executing a bound attack by holding the tag button. This allows you to further reduce your opponent’s health to gain victory. Online Features There are more than 50 characters in the game to choose from , but you have to select wisely as each character has their own special set of combat moves. The game offers plenty of multiplayer action as you can challenge your friends or family members in 2-on-2, 1-on-1 or 1-on-2 tag team matches. Team battles have been changed to a Pair Play mode. This mode allows up to 4 players to individually control a character in a ring. Online Features have been updated as you can now challenge the players from across the world. Ranked matches are available that help you in improving your personal ranking. There is also an offline mode that allows you to change your character’s appearance, play in classic arcade mode and do many other things. Several DLCs are available that add new characters to the game.

productBaseInfoV1.title: C&E  TV-out Cable HDMI Cable with 1080p 4K 3D Ethernet ARC 30 Feet Single Pack(Black, For TV, 9.144 m)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Overview:The HDMI cable is the newest and best digital video connection on the market. HDMI is the only cable that can transfer uncompressed high-definition video and multi channel digital audio in resolutions higher than 1080p. HDMI cables are convenient because they will allow the transfer of digital audio and video in a single cable, permitting a less confusing mess of wires and a cleaner entertainment center. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.Main Features:â¢ 1080p Resolution. Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.â¢ 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.â¢ Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:â¢ Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.â¢ HDMI Ethernet Channel - The HDMI 2.0 specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Connected devices that include this feature can send and receive data via 100 Mb/sec Ethernet, making them instantly ready for any IP-based application.â¢ Audio Return Channel - The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio "upstream" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback. In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.â¢ 3D Support - The version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.â¢ 4K Resolution Support - The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device. Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Battlefield 3(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: First person shooter based games are great for adrenaline junkies who need fast paced action in a controlled setting where target practice and strategy come together to provide a fulfilling gaming experience. The settings used in the game are contemporary while the story could very well be in an alternate universe where terrorists have nuclear capabilities due to the capture of several atomic warheads. The Battlefield game is a first person action adventure package that can provide for hours of entertainment. The extensive single player campaign has a deep rooted storyline that will keep you engaged and highly interested for hours to come. You can also jump right into the multiplayer mode if you want to compete with other people around the world. The game has been developed by DICE and published by EA. It runs on the latest Frostbite 2 Game Engine that delivers stunning visuals especially in open world maps where light flaring has been realistically rendered. Shadows, foliage and terrain have all been rendered beautifully along with the characters and weapon detailing can easily be seen. You ideally take command of a variety of key characters in the game, without really sticking to any one person, though the primary protagonist is seen at the beginning of the game undergoing a debriefing. During a major part of the game, you take control of a team of elite United States Marines, experiencing some heart-pounding first person action across maps set in different parts of the globe, like Paris, Tehran, NYC and other scenic places. You can also control vehicles and fighter jets. The game engine truly delivers some stunning visuals in terms of destruction through explosions, game physics during shoot-outs and dynamic audio processing. With all this thrown in to Battlefield 3, you feel more alive as the player, getting a greater degree of game interaction than ever before.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Spider-Man 3(for PSP)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: A grand adventure awaits Spider-man as he gets to fight his evil nemesis Venom. Spider-Man 3 ups the difficulty level for veteran spider-man fans, allowing them to explore the game’s universe as they deem fit. With stunning new graphics and new controls, Spider-Man 3 brings a new story that will make gamers jump with joy. Discover the city of New York like never before and have a memorable time playing Spider-Man 3. The Spider-Man 3 video game was developed to coincide with the movie release back in the year 2007. Based on a similar story as the film, you will be fighting a variety of villains within the game. The game is targeted towards gamers who are fans of the superhero. The open world action game has plenty of features to keep you glued to your PC screens for hours. The video game DVD is available for PC and comes with a Teen rating from ESRB. Synopsis and Features Peter Parker is in big trouble. The city of New York is infested with several villains and they are all hell-bent on destroying the city. While fighting the several villains Peter will acquire new powers, multiplying his strength to insane levels. With so much power in his hands will Peter stick to his agenda of not harming the innocent or will be succumb to evil and hurt everyone within his path? Spider-Man 3’s story questions the motives of Peter Parker as he tries to make sense of what is right and wrong. Help him find the answers or see him die. In Spider-Man 3 it’s your choice, every time. Developed by Beenox and published by Activision, Spider-Man 3 builds a new world where anything is possible for the superhero. The minimum hardware specifications essential to play the game smoothly on your computer are Windows 2000, a 2.8 GHz Pentium 4 or AMD equivalent processor, 6 GB of free hard disk space, 1 GB RAM and a 256 MB RAM equipped NVidia or ATI Radeon graphics card. The single-player campaign will take you across New York City as you swing from one building to another using the web shooters in your hand. This is the best feature in the game as you can discover the entire city by swinging from different buildings. The camera within the game follows your every movement, giving you an adrenaline rush every time you play the game. Missions are spread across the city and you can select the one you like. The main story moves forward as you complete the missions. If you want to do something else other than the main missions, Spider-man 3 offers plenty of side missions too. These range from catching street thugs to even disarming bombs. Spider-man 3 also includes many mini-games. These games if successfully completed allow you to execute truly spectacular moves to stun your enemies. The combat in the game feels fresh as you get to execute a variety of moves. The animations with the game are beautifully rendered, allowing you to see every fight move when you are defeating your enemies. The game also has a feature similar to bullet-time that allows you to dodge brutal attacks from your enemies. Just press a button and you will be moving in a slow state, giving you an advantage over your opponents. The bosses in the game are huge and are fun to fight against. You can use all the available moves to defeat them and move to the next level. The various enemies you will face during the missions are Kingpin, Kraven, Lizard, Venom and many others. The updates, wallpapers and other content for the game can be downloaded directly from the company’s website.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010(for Xbox 360)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Football gaming will never be the same once you play Pro Evolution Soccer 2010. Pro Evolution Soccer 2010 was developed and published by Konami and was given a score of 8.1 out of 10 from IGN. This single-player/multiplayer football video game for the Wii console received a rating of 3 from PEGI. Also, PES 2010 is the 9th installment in the Pro Evolution Soccer series. Lionel Messi is showcased on the cover of Pro Evolution Soccer 2010. Both defensive and offensive elements are affected by the new game balance system that has been incorporated in Pro Evolution Soccer 2010. Apart from overall stamina, players also have instantaneous stamina now which eliminates unbeatable runs. The player’s control of the ball and body balance will be adversely affected if sprinting is overdone. Certain attacking players can perform different A.I. feints in order to bypass opponents while dribbling. To reduce the space that opposing attackers are given, defenders will now have to think of how to close down on the former. The newly implemented free kick system allows the user to see his or her shooting angle from the kicker’s perspective and targeting is achieved via the use of a pointer system; this allows the user to give more pace and swerve to his or her kicks based on one’s abilities. Neat new animations show players signalling for passes. The Master League and Champions Road modes make a return in this game as in earlier installments.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Ultimate Action Triple Pack (Includes 3 Games)(for Xbox 360)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Excitement knows no bounds, now that this adrenalin-pumping action-adventure game combo is out! Explore uncharted territories as you embark on thrilling adventures that require you to battle treacherous forces with an arsenal of weapons to ensure your survival or greater. Published by Square Enix, this game combo of three games (Tomb Raider, Sleeping Dogs and Just Cause 2) for the Xbox 360 console has been given a provisional rating of 18 by PEGI. Tomb Raider: After a destructive storm destroys her ship, a frightened and young Lara Croft is left stranded on an isolated island. Naive and separated from her shipmates, Lara is left with only one mission: survival. Now, Lara must somehow regroup with her friends and battle the lurking threats that the island poses. Play as Lara Croft and discover where her story began with her first adventure. Sleeping Dogs: Set in a fictional version of Hong Kong that is split into four districts, Sleeping Dogs sees the player taking on the role of undercover cop, Wei Shen, who is given the responsibility of infiltrating and bringing down the Sun On Yee, one of the world's most feared criminal organisations. Players get to discover the crowded and glistening streets of Hong Kong as the player-character gets pulled deeper into the vicious underworld. As the plot progresses, the line between right and wrong starts to blur for Wei Shen and his obligations to the police and the underworld toy with his ideas of loyalty and betrayal. Just Cause 2: Set four years after Just Cause, the prequel, on a fictional island-nation called Panau, Just Cause 2 follows Rico Rodriguez as he is thrown by “the Agency” into a nation where the leader, Pandak "Baby" Panay,  is a ruthless tyrant and rival gangs are in a state of perpetual war on the streets. Somewhere on the very island lies Rico’s friend and mentor, Tom Sheldon, who has gained top-secret intelligence and gone rogue. The player is required to take on the role of Rico Rodriguez, the Agency's most deadly weapon, and infiltrate the island so as to overthrow the vicious Pandak "Baby" Panay and find Sheldon.

productBaseInfoV1.title: SONY PlayStation 4 (PS4) 1 TB 1000 GB with Extra Golden Controller(Jet Black)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Features such as an exceptional graphics performance and a customized memory make the PlayStation4 an immersive gaming experience. A processor that is 10 times more powerful than the PlayStation3 creates a setting that is bigger and bolder. Performance CPU x86-64 AMD Jaguar GPU 1.84 TFLOPS RAM 8 GB GDDR5 A single-chip custom processor ensures that your games run without a glitch while the 8 core Jaguar low power x86-64 AMD CPU allows for a smooth flow. An 8 GB Graphics Card allows for an incredible gaming experience, supporting the most superior games. A 1.84 TFLOPS, AMD next-generation Radeon™ based graphics engine further enhances the experience. DUALSHOCK 4 The all-new DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controller brings inspired play to your hands. Featuring a host of brand new design changes like the SHARE button to show off your greatest gaming moments, a new touch pad, while still retaining the trademark layout of the Dualshock 3 we have all come to recognize and love, this is some of Sony's best work yet. Keys / Switches PS button, SHARE button, OPTIONS button, Directional buttons (Up/Down/Left/Right), Action buttons (Triangle, Circle, Cross, Square), R1/L1/R2/L2, Left stick / L3 button, Right stick / R3 button, Touch Pad Button. Touch Pad A responsive touch pad located on the top of the controller offers gamers new ways to play and interact with games. Storage 1 TB HDD Installing games becomes effortless with the PS4's ability to store up to 1 TB of data. Software Gaming on the PS4 is made easier with the console's smart software. Automatic Background Updates Updates to the PlayStation 4 are downloaded and stored in the background, facilitating ease of use. PlayAsYouDownload Revolutionizing the gaming experience is the PlayAsYouDownload feature that allows you to play a game just as it starts downloading to your system. View all 4 features Media The PS4 has the ability to read DVDs at the rate of 8 CAV and Blu-Ray Discs at 6 CAV, making gaming a crystal-clear, high-definition experience. Connectors 3.0 AUX Port x 1 HDMI Out Port Port Digital Output (Optical) Connect your PS4 to your TV or monitors and experience gaming that comes to life with the console's connectors. Two Super-Speed USB ports, an AUX port, a HDMI out port and a Digital Output port that would leave any gamer satisfied. Networking Multi-player and online gaming is facilitated by the PS4's Ethernet (10BASE-T, 100BASE-TX, 1000BASE-T), IEEE 802.11 b/g/n and Bluetooth 2.1 (EDR). One can even use the PlayStation Vita to continue a PS4 game - this is done by connecting through a location's Wi-Fi networks with Remote Play.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Blacklist (Upper Echelon Edition)(for Xbox 360)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Fans of Splinter Cell are eagerly waiting to reprise the role of Sam Fisher, a secret operative that reports only to the President of the United States of America. Even though the United States has military presence all around the world, some missions just cannot be carried out by the book. That is when Sam Fisher and his newly formed Fourth Echelon unit come into play. This clandestine team of operatives must avert disaster and help guide Fisher through the missions with vital information. This version of the Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Blacklist is developed for the personal computer running Microsoft Windows operating system by Ubisoft Toronto and published by Ubisoft. The LEAD engine or Unreal Engine 2.5 as it is unofficially known is used as the platform to run the game. Blacklist can be played in single-player, multiplayer and co-op modes allowing you different gameplay options. This action adventure game involves you using your stealth skills to takeout enemy units without drawing attention to yourself. Synopsis and Features After the events of the last game in the series, President Caldwell officially terminates the corrupt Third Echelon and all its operations around the world. The newly-formed Fourth Echelon is led by Sam Fisher and comprises of elite operatives brought together from different agencies. Their objective is to operate in a mobile environment and travel the world executing clandestine missions authorized the President. A group of rogue countries initiate a terror ultimatum called Blacklist against the U.S of A. The countdown will trigger a deadly series of terrorist attacks on U.S interests and cause mass destruction of both life and property. The President orders Sam and his elite team of operatives to hunt down the terrorists by any means necessary and prevent the Blacklist countdown from reaching zero. Get on the mission with Sam in his tactical suit and goggles to hunt down the members of the Blacklist and use ruthless interrogation methods to extract vital information from captured enemies. Acting above the law and with very little time, Sam has to figure out the clues with the help of his elite tactical team which includes Anna Grim Grimsdottir as technical operations manager, Charlie Cole as the resident hacker and CIA operative Issac Briggs, who brings his expertise with weapons to the table. Travel between exotic locations and US cities to find out who is behind the Blacklist countdown. The Paladin is a re-purposed stealth airliner that allows Sam and his team to be a fully mobile unit. With unlimited resources and cutting edge technology, the Fourth Echelon is the last line of defense against unknown enemies. The Strategic Mission Interface (SMI) keeps Sam and his team informed of terrorist attacks in real time and keeps them updated while they are on the move. Use the SMI to access the money you earn by completing missions and objectives to upgrade your weapons and gear. The new Kill in Motion feature lets Sam strike lethal blows with precision by marking and executing enemy units in a single fluid motion. Use new and upgraded gadgets to get vital information about enemy whereabouts and plan your action accordingly. Use the upgraded snake cam and micro tri-rotor drone to scout ahead in order to mark enemy agents to execute. Use the curved and brutal Karambit knife to kill enemy units in close quarter encounters. The game is yet to be released and the rating is also pending. Receive the Upper Echelon Edition Upper Echelon edition contains: The Dead coast single player and co-op map A pair of gold goggles The legendary Upper Echelon Suit

productBaseInfoV1.title: C&E  TV-out Cable HDMI Cable 30 Feet 3D and Audio Return UltraHD 4K Ready 4 Pack(Black, For PlayStation, 9.144 m)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Overview:The HDMI cable is the newest and best digital video connection on the market. HDMI is the only cable that can transfer uncompressed high-definition video and multi channel digital audio in resolutions higher than 1080p. HDMI cables are convenient because they will allow the transfer of digital audio and video in a single cable, permitting a less confusing mess of wires and a cleaner entertainment center. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.Main Features:• 1080p Resolution. Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.• 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.• Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:• Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.• HDMI Ethernet Channel - The HDMI 2.0 specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Connected devices that include this feature can send and receive data via 100 Mb/sec Ethernet, making them instantly ready for any IP-based application.• Audio Return Channel - The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio "upstream" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback. In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.• 3D Support - The version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.• 4K Resolution Support - The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device. Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.

productBaseInfoV1.title: C&E  TV-out Cable HDMI Cable 15 Feet 3D and Audio Return UltraHD 4K Ready 3 Pack(Black, For Computer, 4.572 m)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Overview:The HDMI cable is the newest and best digital video connection on the market. HDMI is the only cable that can transfer uncompressed high-definition video and multi channel digital audio in resolutions higher than 1080p. HDMI cables are convenient because they will allow the transfer of digital audio and video in a single cable, permitting a less confusing mess of wires and a cleaner entertainment center. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.Main Features:• 1080p Resolution. Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.• 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.• Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:• Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.• HDMI Ethernet Channel - The HDMI 2.0 specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Connected devices that include this feature can send and receive data via 100 Mb/sec Ethernet, making them instantly ready for any IP-based application.• Audio Return Channel - The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio "upstream" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback. In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.• 3D Support - The version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.• 4K Resolution Support - The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device. Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Alien : Isolation(for PC)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: What if you were to encounter a bloodthirsty alien when drifting in space? What would you do? You have to remember one thing - in the depths of space, no one can hear you scream. A single-player first-person survival horror stealth game for the PS4 console, Alien: Isolation has been developed by The Creative Assembly and published by Sega as an extension of the Alien franchise. Set in the year 2137, 15 years after the events that took place in the 1979 film Alien which was directed by Ridley Scott, Alien: Isolation follows Amanda, the daughter of Ellen Ripley (the 1979 film’s protagonist), as she inspects the disappearance of her mother. Having been transferred to the space station Sevastopol, Amanda’s objective is to find and recover the flight recorder of Nostromo, a commercial towing spaceship. Rated 18 by PEGI, the gameplay of Alien: Isolation requires the player to be extremely stealthy in order to survive. A seemingly indestructible extraterrestrial creature, with an advanced artificial intelligence, is aboard the vessel where the player is stranded; its programmed to hunt down the player based on sound, sight and smell. The A.I. of the Alien has been developed to make it adapt as the game progresses, hence the creature gives the illusion that it learns from confrontations between it and the player. The Alien detects and investigates secondary sources of disturbances; for example, if an air lock or a locker is left open then the Alien looks for the person who opened it. The player can crouch and hide behind objects so as to stay out of the Alien’s line of vision; the player can also sneakily peak over or lean around objects to covertly see what the Alien is doing. The player has the ability to run, though this will make the player’s location much more obvious. Furthermore, the player has a motion tracker and a flashlight so that he or she can spot the Alien’s movements. Though the motion tracker helps in roughly isolating the whereabouts of the Alien, the depth of field effect that it creates denies the player the ability to focus on what’s in front of them and on the tracker simultaneously. The non-linear gameplay of Alien: Isolation allows the player to complete challenges in various sequences, thereby giving the game a more open-ended feel. Additionally, players can hack certain computers and devices to trigger in-game actions or access information.

productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Overview:The HDMI cable is the newest and best digital video connection on the market. HDMI is the only cable that can transfer uncompressed high-definition video and multi channel digital audio in resolutions higher than 1080p. HDMI cables are convenient because they will allow the transfer of digital audio and video in a single cable, permitting a less confusing mess of wires and a cleaner entertainment center. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.Main Features:• 1080p Resolution. Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.• 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.• Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:• Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.• HDMI Ethernet Channel - The HDMI 2.0 specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Connected devices that include this feature can send and receive data via 100 Mb/sec Ethernet, making them instantly ready for any IP-based application.• Audio Return Channel - The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio "upstream" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback. In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.• 3D Support - The version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.• 4K Resolution Support - The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device. Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.

Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Call Of Duty : Ghosts (Prestige Edition)(for PS3)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: When the world is threatened by a force of evil a team of elite warriors must unite and do everything within their power to overcome the rising peril. Call Of Duty: Ghosts is a single-player/multiplayer action-adventure first-person shooter video game for the Xbox 360 console. The storyline revolves around Elias and his sons who are part of a US special operations team. Together, they must track down the perpetrator of a series of heinous crimes, Rorke, who was once a part of the Ghosts, a group consisting of expert agents of warfare. The traitor, Rorke, has set out to kill Ajax who is a part of the Ghosts. Will the brothers and their father Elias be able to prevent the death of Ajax and the chaos and destruction that is being doled out by the terrorists known as the Federation? Or will the world succumb to graver ruin? CoD’s (Call of Duty) previous releases for the console have inspired a whole new wave of gamers, a cult almost, who can’t help but be immersed by the marvelous storyline and gameplay of this thrilling game. Ghosts, is nothing short of genius either. Developed by Infinity Ward and published by Activision, Call Of Duty: Ghosts has an engaging campaign mode where you play as Logan Walker, a battle specialist, for most of the game. However, there are many other playable characters, including Logan’s father, Elias Walker, and an astronaut named Baker. Call of Duty: Ghosts has been rated 18 by PEGI for simulated violence and war depictions. The multiplayer mode of this game is nothing like its predecessors as there are new mechanics that have been implemented. There are certain areas on the various maps available that can be changed or destroyed. A few maps house a nuke-like kill streak reward, the ODIN strike, which can be used by eliminating the top player of the other team and accomplishing various challenges once you pick up a briefcase that is dropped. A new game type called Squads, which can be played solo or with other players, along with numerous other multiplayer modes makes CoD: Ghosts an unforgettable gaming experience! The Prestige Edition of Call of Duty: Ghosts comes packed with a high-value cache of collectible physical items and loads of bonus digital content which was inspired by the legendary masked Special Operations Unit. All this will give you the comprehensive Call of Duty experience. A shock-proof and water resistant 1080p HD Tactical Camera with a 170° wide angle lens, that has been modeled for in-game equipment, enables you to record, edit and share custom-made videos. Furthermore, this camera features three attachments which makes it seamlessly portable. A 4GB memory card, batteries and an editing software are other excellent additions. Experience a fresh collection of CoD: Ghosts multiplayer content and more as the Call of Duty: Ghosts Season Pass offers four epic DLC map packs. In addition, the Team Leader digital content pack and a Season Pass-bonus that offers a unique MP character head, weapon camo, headgear, player patch, reticle, player background and player card are in store for you with this edition as well. A wearable paracord strap allows you to carry around more than 10 feet worth of versatile paracord no matter where you go. A limited edition steel game case that features premium artwork has been included too. An in-game Ghosts insignia player patch, an in-game Ghosts insignia player card, a Ghosts-themed player background and a digital copy of the in-game music score are among other neat extras.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2014(for PSP)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Rated 3 by PEGI, developed and published by Konami, Pro Evolution Soccer 2014 is a single-player/multiplayer association football video game for the Xbox 360 console. Pro Evolution Soccer 2014 is one of the latest releases in the PES series. This game functions on a new and modified version of the Fox Engine. The UEFA Europa League, UEFA Champions League and UEFA Super Cup competitions are fully licensed in Pro Evolution Soccer 2014. The sublime control and first touch features set some players apart from the rest. The TrueBall Tech feature allows players to knock or trap the ball during a pass; this can be done by utilizing the analogue stick. A newly introduced M.A.S.S. (Motion Animation Stability System) component imitates the physical contact between players within tailored animations which flow smoothly into each other. M.A.S.S. immediately reacts to every situation instead of a sequence of preset animations being triggered under certain circumstances. This component also takes into consideration factors such as the power and size of players so as to determine the rate at which players recover from stumbles and maintain possession of the ball by blocking opponents. Many new types of tackles have been implemented in Pro Evolution Soccer 2014 as well. Apart from skill and playing styles, players also have mental attributes; this new feature adversely affects players when they are having a bad game. The match atmosphere is more dynamic now because of the implementation of stunning A.I. (artificial intelligence) systems and new sound effects. Another highlight is the new Player ID system which lets users recognize players with great ease due to an accurate recreation of play and running styles. The Combination Play feature can be used to incorporate an array of diverse tactics.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Bioshock Infinite (Complete Edition)(for Xbox 360)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: “Welcome to the city of Columbia. Floating amongst the clouds, cruising far above sea level, this is a place unlike any you've ever seen. Please enjoy your voyage.” And that’s just the gist of the place you're going to encounter. The third installment in the popular Bioshock series, Bioshock Infinite Complete Edition for the PS3 console breaks away from the underwater setting that defined the first two games. Set in 1912, you play Booker DeWitt, a disgraced former private detective, who’s goal is to find a woman named Elizabeth and return her safely. The only problem is she's being held in the flying city. And from that point onwards the game’s intense storytelling unfolds. Oh and fair warning, your trip is not going to be a pleasure cruise. Summary The game is a stunning original world of retro-sci-fi technology and gorgeous scenery. It consists of a cast of memorable characters, great villain and a greater monster, and above all, a story twist that most people won’t see coming. And that’s all that one can divulge. For revealing more will take out the thrill and hours of gameplay this shooter, action-adventure game promises.  Game Modes and Rating This is a single-player game and it has a PEGI 18 rating.

productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Overview:The HDMI cable is the newest and best digital video connection on the market. HDMI is the only cable that can transfer uncompressed high-definition video and multi channel digital audio in resolutions higher than 1080p. HDMI cables are convenient because they will allow the transfer of digital audio and video in a single cable, permitting a less confusing mess of wires and a cleaner entertainment center. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.Main Features:• 1080p Resolution. Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.• 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.• Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:• Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.Main Features:• 1080p Resolution. Audio Return Channel 3D - 3D is the latest rage for both home theater and gaming.• 4K - The 4K resolution is 3840 x 2160 pixels @ 24 Hz.• Deep Color - The Deep Color feature provides a minimum of 8-bits per color element (24-bits total), providing for a total of over 16 million color variations. x.v.Color - x.v.Color High Definition Audio - HDMI supports a full range of high definition audio types, including SA-CD, DVD-Audio, DTS-HD Master Audio, and Dolby TrueHD.Specifications:• Our High Speed HDMI cables with Ethernet have been designed to meet the performance standards set by HDMI 2.0 and have passed stringent Category 2 testing. They are backward compatible to all previous versions.• HDMI Ethernet Channel - The HDMI 2.0 specification adds a data channel to the HDMI connection, enabling high-speed, bi-directional communication. Connected devices that include this feature can send and receive data via 100 Mb/sec Ethernet, making them instantly ready for any IP-based application.• Audio Return Channel - The new specification adds an audio channel that will reduce the number of cables required to deliver audio "upstream" from a TV to an A/V receiver for processing and playback. In cases where a TV features an internal content source, such as a built-in tuner or DVD player, the Audio Return Channel allows the TV to send audio data upstream to the A/V receiver via the HDMI cable, eliminating the need for an extra cable.• 3D Support - The version of the specification defines common 3D formats and resolutions for HDMI-enabled devices, enabling 3D gaming and other 3D video applications.• 4K Resolution Support - The new specification enables HDMI devices to support extremely high HD resolutions, effectively four times the resolution of a 1080p device. Support for 4K allows the HDMI interface to transmit digital content at the same resolution as the state-of-the-art Digital Cinema systems used in many movie theaters.
